atk-s0103a0:3_4: Mallesu viharatīti mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0103a0:3_5: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “mallā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0103a0:3_7: “Anupiyaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo”ti anupiyanti evaṃnāmako mallānaṃ janapadassa eko nigamo,
atk-s0103a0:3_8: taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ chāyūdakasampanne vanasaṇḍe viharatīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:3_14: yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhanto puriso taṃ gāmaṃ apattopi “kuhiṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:3_15: Etadahosīti gāmasamīpe ṭhatvā sūriyaṃ olokentassa etadahosi.
atk-s0103a0:3_18: Kiṃ pana bhagavā kālaṃ ajānitvā nikkhantoti?
atk-s0103a0:3_20: Paccūsakāleyeva hi bhagavā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā lokaṃ volokento ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ bhaggavagottaṃ
atk-s0103a0:3_21: channaparibbājakaṃ disvā “ajjāhaṃ imassa paribbājakassa mayā pubbe katakāraṇaṃ samāharitvā dhammaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0103a0:3_22: sā dhammakathā assa mayi pasādappaṭilābhavasena saphalā bhavissatī”ti ñatvāva paribbājakārāmaṃ pavisitukāmo atippagova nikkhami.
atk-s0103a0:3_23: Tasmā tattha pavisitukāmatāya evaṃ cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0103a0:4_1: Etadavocāti bhagavantaṃ disvā mānathaddhataṃ akatvā satthāraṃ paccuggantvā etaṃ etu kho,
atk-s0103a0:4_5: Kiṃ pana bhagavā pubbepi tattha gatapubboti?
atk-s0103a0:4_8: Lokiyā hi cirassaṃ āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātikaṃ āgataṃ disvā “kuto bhavaṃ āgato,
atk-s0103a0:4_13: Idamāsananti attano nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā sampādetvā dadamāno evamāha.
atk-s0103a0:4_19: bhagavantaṃ uddissa viharissāmī”ti evaṃ paṭiakkhāto nissaṭṭho pariccatto.
atk-s0103a0:5_1: Bhagavantaṃ uddissāti bhagavā me satthā “bhagavato ahaṃ ovādaṃ paṭikaromī”ti evaṃ apadisitvā.
atk-s0103a0:5_2: Ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasīti yācako vā yācitakaṃ paccācikkheyya,
atk-s0103a0:5_4: Tvaṃ pana neva yācako na yācitako,
atk-s0103a0:5_7: ko santo ko samāno kaṃ paccācikkhasīti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:5_9: Yāvañca te idaṃ aparaddhanti yattakaṃ idaṃ tava aparaddhaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:5_10: yattako te aparādho tattako dosoti evāhaṃ bhaggava tassa dosaṃ āropesinti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:6_5: So niyyāti takkarassāti so dhammo takkarassa yathā mayā dhammo desito,
atk-s0103a0:6_6: tathā kārakassa sammā paṭipannassa puggalassa sabbavaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya amatanibbānasacchikiriyāya gacchati,
atk-s0103a0:6_10: Tatra sunakkhattāti tasmiṃ sunakkhatta mayā desite dhamme takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya saṃvattamāne
atk-s0103a0:6_13: Tasmiñhi katepi akatepi mama sāsanassa parihāni natthi,
atk-s0103a0:7_2: “Idaṃ nāma lokassa agga”nti evaṃ jānitabbampi aggaṃ mariyādaṃ na taṃ paññapetīti vadati.
atk-s0103a0:8_3: “dosaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ettakaṃ vippalapitvā bhagavato kathaṃ suṇanto appatiṭṭho niravo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0103a0:9_2: evaṃ tvaṃ makkhibhāve ṭhito sayameva garahaṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti makkhibhāve ādīnavadassanatthaṃ anekapariyāyenātiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:9_6: So avisahantoti so sunakkhatto yassa pubbe tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa mukhaṃ nappahoti,
atk-s0103a0:9_7: so dāni teneva mukhena avaṇṇaṃ katheti,
atk-s0103a0:9_8: addhā avisahanto asakkonto brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ attano bālatāya avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā hīnāyāvatto.
atk-s0103a0:9_12: Evaṃ tīṇi ratanāni thomentā manussā tuyheva dosaṃ dassessantīti.
atk-s0103a0:9_13: Iti kho teti evaṃ kho te,
atk-s0103a0:9_16: Tato evaṃ dose uppanne satthā atītānāgate appaṭihatañāṇo,
atk-s0103a0:9_17: mayhaṃ evaṃ doso uppajjissatīti jānantopi puretaraṃ na kathesīti vattuṃ na lacchasīti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:9_20: Yathā taṃ āpāyikoti yathā apāye nibbattanāraho satto apakkameyya,
atk-s0103a0:11_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ na karotīti ca aggaññaṃ na paññapetīti ca.
atk-s0103a0:11_3: Tattha “aggaññaṃ na paññapetī”ti idaṃ padaṃ suttapariyosāne dassessati.
atk-s0103a0:11_4: “Pāṭihāriyaṃ na karotī”ti imassa pana padassa anusandhidassanavasena ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0103a0:12_5: Uttarakā nāmāti itthiliṅgavasena uttarakāti evaṃnāmako thūlūnaṃ janapadassa nigamo,
atk-s0103a0:12_9: Kukkuravatikoti samādinnakukkuravato sunakho viya ghāyitvā khādati,
atk-s0103a0:12_12: Catukkuṇḍikoti catusaṅghaṭṭito dve jāṇūni dve ca kappare bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā vicarati.
atk-s0103a0:12_15: Mukhenevāti hatthena aparāmasitvā khādanīyaṃ mukheneva khādati,
atk-s0103a0:12_18: Ayaṃ samaṇoti ayaṃ arahataṃ samaṇo ekoti.
atk-s0103a0:12_20: Evaṃ kirassa patthanā ahosi “iminā samaṇena sadiso añño samaṇo nāma natthi,
atk-s0103a0:12_26: Evaṃ sabbaññubuddhassa pacchato carantova imaṃ pāpakaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkesi.
atk-s0103a0:13_0: Etadavocāti bhagavā kira cintesi “ayaṃ sunakkhatto pāpajjhāsayo,
atk-s0103a0:13_2: Athevaṃ cintento tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “ayaṃ moghapuriso mādisassa sabbaññuno pacchato āgacchanto acelaṃ arahāti maññati,
atk-s0103a0:13_3: idheva dānāyaṃ bālo niggahaṃ arahatī”ti anivattitvāva etaṃ tvampi nāmātiādivacanamavoca.
atk-s0103a0:13_5: Garahanto hi naṃ bhagavā “tvampi nāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0103a0:13_7: ahaṃ samaṇo sakyaputtiyoti evaṃ paṭijānissasī”ti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0103a0:13_12: Maccharāyatīti “mā aññassa arahattaṃ hotū”ti kiṃ bhagavā evaṃ arahattassa maccharāyatīti pucchati.
atk-s0103a0:13_16: etadatthameva me bahūni dukkarāni karontena pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0103a0:13_21: arahante ca anarahantoti evaṃ tassa diṭṭhi uppannā.
atk-s0103a0:13_23: Yaṃ kho panāti yaṃ etaṃ acelaṃ evaṃ maññasi.
atk-s0103a0:14_1: Tesaṃ kira tigāvuto attabhāvo appamaṃsalohito purāṇapaṇṇasadiso kakkaṭakānaṃ viya akkhīni nikkhamitvā matthake tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0103a0:15_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti bhagavati ettakaṃ vatvā tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ gate vihārā nikkhamitvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0103a0:15_7: Yathā samaṇassa gotamassāti yathā samaṇassa gotamassa micchā vacanaṃ assa,
atk-s0103a0:15_9: Evaṃ vutte acelo sunakho viya uddhanaṭṭhāne nipanno sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā akkhīni ummīletvā olokento kiṃ kathesi
atk-s0103a0:15_11: samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya mayaṃ sūriye uggate khajjopanakā viya jātā.
atk-s0103a0:15_14: Verino pana kathā nāma tacchā na hoti,
atk-s0103a0:15_15: gaccha tvaṃ ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā punadeva nipajji.
atk-s0103a0:16_2: Yathā tanti yathā asaddahamāno koci gaṇeyya,
atk-s0103a0:16_4: Ekadivasañca tikkhattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā eko divaso atīto,
atk-s0103a0:16_6: Sattamaṃ divasanti so kira sunakkhattassa vacanaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ nirāhārova ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:16_7: Athassa sattame divase eko upaṭṭhāko “amhākaṃ kulūpakasamaṇassa ajja sattamo divaso gehaṃ anāgacchantassa
atk-s0103a0:16_8: aphāsu nu kho jāta”nti sūkaramaṃsaṃ pacāpetvā bhattamādāya gantvā purato bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipi.
atk-s0103a0:16_9: Acelo disvā cintesi “samaṇassa gotamassa kathā tacchā vā atacchā vā hotu,
atk-s0103a0:16_10: āhāraṃ pana khāditvā suhitassa me maraṇampi sumaraṇa”nti dve hatthe jaṇṇukāni ca bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchipūraṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0103a0:16_11: So rattibhāge jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto alasakena kālamakāsi.
atk-s0103a0:16_13: tathāpi taṃ divasaṃ bhuñjitvā alasakena kālaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0103a0:17_0: Bīraṇatthambaketi titthiyā kira “kālaṅkato korakkhattiyo”ti sutvā divasāni gaṇetvā idaṃ tāva saccaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:17_1: idāni naṃ aññattha chaḍḍetvā “musāvādena samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ niggaṇhissāmā”ti gantvā tassa sarīraṃ valliyā bandhitvā ākaḍḍhantā “ettha chaḍḍessāma,
atk-s0103a0:17_4: Te kaḍḍhamānā bīraṇatthambakasusānaṃyeva gantvā susānabhāvaṃ ñatvā “aññattha chaḍḍessāmā”ti ākaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:18_2: So kira cintesi “avasesaṃ tāva samaṇassa gotamassa vacanaṃ sameti,
atk-s0103a0:18_3: matassa pana uṭṭhāya aññena saddhiṃ kathanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0103a0:18_7: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti iminā kāraṇena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0103a0:18_9: Jānāmi āvusoti matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā kathetuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0103a0:18_12: Bhagavā kira korakkhattiyaṃ asurayonito ānetvā sarīre adhimocetvā kathāpesi.
atk-s0103a0:19_1: Tatheva taṃ vipākanti tassa vacanassa vipākaṃ tatheva,
atk-s0103a0:22_10: Puratthimena vesālinti vesālito avidūre puratthimāya disāya.
atk-s0103a0:23_1: Yena acelakoti bhagavato vattaṃ katvā yena acelo kaḷāramaṭṭako tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0103a0:23_2: Pañhaṃ apucchīti gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0103a0:23_3: Na sampāyāsīti na sammā ñāṇagatiyā pāyāsi,
atk-s0103a0:23_4: andho viya visamaṭṭhāne tattha tattheva pakkhali.
atk-s0103a0:23_9: Asampāyantoti kabarakkhīni parivattetvā olokento “asikkhitakassa santike vuṭṭhosi,
atk-s0103a0:23_11: apehi mā etasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhāsī”ti vadanto.
atk-s0103a0:23_12: Kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātvākāsīti kuppanākāraṃ kopaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:23_16: Mā vata no ahosīti aho vata me na bhaveyya.
atk-s0103a0:23_20: Evañca pana cintetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā “khamatha me,
atk-s0103a0:23_22: Sopi ito paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ nāma na pucchissasīti.
atk-s0103a0:24_4: taṃ taṃ brahmacariyaṃ pahāya sabhariyoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:24_5: Odanakummāsanti surāmaṃsato atirekaṃ odanampi kummāsampi bhuñjamāno.
atk-s0103a0:24_8: “Kataṃ hoti uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriya”nti idha sattavatapadātikkamavasena satta pāṭihāriyāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0103a0:26_10: Te tatthāti te mayaṃ tattha samāgataṭṭhāne.
atk-s0103a0:26_11: Taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇāhanti tato tato diguṇaṃ diguṇaṃ ahaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0103a0:26_12: bhagavatā saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ asamatthabhāvaṃ jānantopi “uttamapurisena saddhiṃ paṭṭhapetvā asakkuṇantassāpi pāsaṃso hotī”ti ñatvā evamāha.
atk-s0103a0:26_13: Nagaravāsinopi taṃ sutvā “asamattho nāma evaṃ na gajjati,
atk-s0103a0:26_14: addhā ayampi arahā bhavissatī”ti tassa mahantaṃ sakkāramakaṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:27_1: Yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamīti “sunakkhatto kira pāthikaputto evaṃ vadatī”ti assosi.
atk-s0103a0:28_0: So bhagavato vattaṃ katvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe pāthikaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchi “tumhe kira evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kathethā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0103a0:28_2: Yadi evaṃ “mā bhāyittha vissatthā punappunaṃ evaṃ vadatha,
atk-s0103a0:28_5: tumhehi saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0103a0:28_6: ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa kathetvā bhayaṃ uppādetvā taṃ aññato gahetvā gamissāmi,
atk-s0103a0:28_7: tumhe mā bhāyitthā”ti taṃ assāsetvā bhagavato santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0103a0:28_9: Taṃ vācantiādīsu “ahaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhīti vicariṃ,
atk-s0103a0:28_10: abhūtaṃ me kathitaṃ nāhaṃ buddho”ti vadanto taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma.
atk-s0103a0:28_11: Raho nisīditvā cintayamāno “ahaṃ ‘ettakaṃ kālaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhī’ti vicariṃ,
atk-s0103a0:28_12: ito dāni paṭṭhāya nāhaṃ buddho”ti cintayanto taṃ cittaṃ pajahati nāma.
atk-s0103a0:28_13: “Ahaṃ ‘ettakaṃ kālaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhī’ti pāpakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā vicariṃ,
atk-s0103a0:28_14: ito dāni paṭṭhāya imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahāmī”ti pajahanto taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati nāma.
atk-s0103a0:28_15: Evaṃ akaronto pana taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvāti vuccati.
atk-s0103a0:28_16: Vipateyyāti bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya gīvato pateyya,
atk-s0103a0:29_4: pāthikaputtoti evaṃ ekaṃsena bhagavato vācāya odhāritāya sace acelo pāthikaputto.
atk-s0103a0:29_5: Virūparūpenāti vigatarūpena vigacchitasabhāvena rūpena attano rūpaṃ pahāya adissamānena kāyena.
atk-s0103a0:29_7: Tadassa bhagavato musāti evaṃ sante bhagavato taṃ vacanaṃ musā bhaveyyāti musāvādena niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0103a0:29_8: Ṭhapetvā kira etaṃ na aññena bhagavā musāvādena niggahitapubboti.
atk-s0103a0:31_1: Ajitopi nāma licchavīnaṃ senāpatīti so kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi,
atk-s0103a0:31_3: Athassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā manussā pāthikaputtaṃ pucchiṃsu “kuhiṃ nibbatto senāpatī”ti? So āha –
atk-s0103a0:31_5: Idañca pana vatvā puna āha “tumhākaṃ senāpati mama santikaṃ āgamma ahaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanamakatvā samaṇassa
atk-s0103a0:31_6: gotamassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā niraye nibbattomhī”ti paroditthāti.
atk-s0103a0:31_7: Tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāyāti ettha “pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāyā”ti kasmā na vadati? Abhāvā.
atk-s0103a0:33_5: Evaṃ mahatiṃ kira parisaṃ ṭhapetvā sunakkhattaṃ añño sannipātetuṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0103a0:33_6: Teneva bhagavā ettakaṃ kālaṃ sunakkhattaṃ gahetvā vicari.
atk-s0103a0:34_5: “ahaṃ atimahantaṃ kathaṃ kathetvā sadevake loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ paṭiviruddho,
atk-s0103a0:34_6: mayhaṃ kho panabbhantare arahattaṃ vā pāṭihāriyakaraṇahetu vā natthi,
atk-s0103a0:34_8: athassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano ‘tvaṃ dāni pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto kasmā attano pamāṇamajānitvā
atk-s0103a0:34_9: loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ paṭimallo hutvā gajjasī’ti kaṭṭhaleḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhessatī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:34_10: Tenassa mahājanasannipātañceva tena bhagavato ca āgamanaṃ sutvā bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā udapādi.
atk-s0103a0:34_11: So tato dukkhā muccitukāmo tindukakhāṇukaparibbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0103a0:34_14: upasaṅkamitvā pana dūraṃ aḍḍhayojanantaraṃ paribbājakārāmaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0103a0:34_15: Tatthapi cittassādaṃ alabhamāno antantena āvijjhitvā ārāmapaccante ekaṃ gahanaṭṭhānaṃ upadhāretvā pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0103a0:34_17: “sace ayaṃ bālo kassacideva kathaṃ gahetvā idhāgaccheyya,
atk-s0103a0:34_18: mā nassatu bālo”ti “nisinnapāsāṇaphalakaṃ tassa sarīre allīnaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0103a0:34_19: Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena taṃ tassa sarīre allīyi.
atk-s0103a0:34_20: So mahāaddubandhanabaddho viya chinnapādo viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:35_0: Assosīti ito cito ca pāthikaputtaṃ pariyesamānā parisā tassa anupadaṃ gantvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā āgatena
atk-s0103a0:35_1: aññatarena purisena “tumhe kaṃ pariyesathā”ti vutte pāthikaputtanti.
atk-s0103a0:36_0: 22. Saṃsappatīti osīdati. Tattheva sañcarati. Pāvaḷā vuccati ānisadaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0103a0:38_1: Goyugehīti goyuttehi satamattehi vā sahassamattehi vā yugehi.
atk-s0103a0:39_3: samaṇo gotamo ‘acelo pāthikaputto āsanāpi na vuṭṭhahissatī’ti āha.
atk-s0103a0:39_4: Handāhaṃ gantvā yena kenaci upāyena taṃ āsanā vuṭṭhāpemi.
atk-s0103a0:39_5: Ettāvatā ca samaṇassa gotamassa parājayo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:40_1: Sīhassāti cattāro sīhā tiṇasīho ca kāḷasīho ca paṇḍusīho ca kesarasīho ca.
atk-s0103a0:40_2: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ sīhānaṃ kesarasīho aggataṃ gato,
atk-s0103a0:40_15: te palāyantūti attano sūrabhāvasannissitena kāruññena naditvā.
atk-s0103a0:42_1: ekadivasaṃ kira so sīho gocarato nivattamāno taṃ siṅgālaṃ bhayena palāyamānaṃ disvā kāruññajāto hutvā “vayasa, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0103a0:42_7: Sīho gocarato āgacchanto mahantaṃ mahantaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ āharati.
atk-s0103a0:42_8: So taṃ khāditvā avidūre pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vasati.
atk-s0103a0:42_11: mama vijambhanakāle avidūre ṭhatvā ‘viroca sāmī’ti vattuṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:43_0: Athekadivasaṃ jarasiṅgālo udakasoṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto attano chāyaṃ olokento addasa attano thūlasarīratañceva mahākhandhatañca.
atk-s0103a0:43_1: Disvā ‘jarasiṅgālosmī’ti manaṃ akatvā “ahampi sīho jāto”ti maññi.
atk-s0103a0:43_3: yuttaṃ nāma tava iminā attabhāvena parassa ucchiṭṭhamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ,
atk-s0103a0:43_5: sīhassāpi cattāro pādā dve dāṭhā dve kaṇṇā ekaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:43_9: Athassa tena asmimānadosena etaṃ “ko cāha”ntiādi maññitamahosi.
atk-s0103a0:43_17: Ke ca chave siṅgāleti ko ca lāmako siṅgālo.
atk-s0103a0:43_18: Ke pana sīhanādeti ko pana sīhanādo siṅgālassa ca sīhanādassa ca ko sambandhoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0103a0:43_22: Etassa hi cattāro paccaye dadamānā sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sambuddhānaṃ demāti denti,
atk-s0103a0:43_23: tena esa abuddho samāno buddhānaṃ niyāmitapaccaye paribhuñjanto sugatāpadānesu jīvati nāma.
atk-s0103a0:43_24: Sugatātirittānīti tesaṃ kira bhojanāni dadamānā buddhānañca buddhasāvakānañca datvā pacchā avasesaṃ sāyanhasamaye denti.
atk-s0103a0:43_26: Tathāgateti tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ āsādetabbaṃ ghaṭṭayitabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:43_28: Āsādetabbanti idampi bahuvacanameva ekavacanaṃ viya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:43_29: Āsādanāti ahaṃ buddhena saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmīti ghaṭṭanā.
atk-s0103a0:44_0: 29. Samekkhiyānāti samekkhitvā, maññitvāti attho. Amaññīti puna amaññittha kotthūti siṅgālo.
atk-s0103a0:45_1: Attānaṃ vighāse samekkhiyāti soṇḍiyaṃ ucchiṭṭhodake thūlaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā.

atk-s0103a0:45_4: sīhena vā samānabalo byagghoyeva ahanti maññati.

atk-s0103a0:46_9: Imāyapi gāthāya bhekādīni bhutvā vaḍḍhitasiṅgālo viya lābhasakkāragiddho tvanti pāthikaputtameva ghaṭṭesi.
atk-s0103a0:49_1: Iti “bhagavā ettakena kathāmaggena pāṭihāriyaṃ na karotī”ti padassa anusandhiṃ dassetvā idāni “na aggaññaṃ
atk-s0103a0:49_2: paññāpetī”ti imassa anusandhiṃ dassento aggaññañcāhanti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:49_7: Tato ca uttaritaraṃ sīlasamādhito paṭṭhāya yāva sabbaññutaññāṇā pajānāmi.
atk-s0103a0:49_8: Tañca pajānaṃ na parāmasāmīti tañca pajānantopi ahaṃ idaṃ nāma pajānāmīti taṇhādiṭṭhimānavasena na parāmasāmi.
atk-s0103a0:49_10: Paccattaññeva nibbuti viditāti attanāyeva attani kilesanibbānaṃ viditaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:49_11: Yadabhijānaṃ tathāgatoti yaṃ kilesanibbānaṃ jānanto tathāgato.
atk-s0103a0:49_12: No anayaṃ āpajjatīti aviditanibbānā titthiyā viya anayaṃ dukkhaṃ byasanaṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0103a0:50_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ titthiyā aggaññaṃ paññapenti,
atk-s0103a0:50_5: Brahmā eva hi ettha ādhipaccabhāvena issaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:50_8: Aggaññaṃ pana ettha desitanti katvā so aggaññaṃ tveva vutto.
atk-s0103a0:50_9: Kathaṃ vihitakanti kena vihitaṃ kinti vihitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:52_8: Bhikkhavo cāti na kevalaṃ samaṇo gotamoyeva,

atk-s0103a0:52_15: Subhantveva tasmiṃ samayeti subhanti eva ca tasmiṃ samaye pajānāti,

atk-s0103a0:53_1: Dukkaraṃ khoti ayaṃ paribbājako yadidaṃ “evaṃpasanno ahaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:53_7: mayā etassa sāsanaṃ paṭipannasadisena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:53_9: Tenassa bhagavā mammaṃ ghaṭṭento viya “dukkaraṃ kho etaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:54_1: Sopi evaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ sutvāpi nāsakkhi kilesakkhayaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:54_2: Desanā panassa āyatiṃ vāsanāya paccayo ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:57_4: Udumbarikāya paribbājakārāmeti udumbarikāya deviyā santake paribbājakārāme.
atk-s0103a0:57_6: Ayaṃ pana mahānubhāvo parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ aggapuriso anāgāmī bhagavatā mahāparisamajjhe evaṃ saṃvaṇṇito –
atk-s0103a0:58_2: aṅgehi samannāgato sandhāno gahapati tathāgate niṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme iriyati.
atk-s0103a0:58_4: Buddhe aveccappasādena dhamme aveccappasādena saṅghe aveccappasādena ariyena sīlena ariyena ñāṇena ariyāya vimuttiyā.
atk-s0103a0:58_7: chahi aṅgehi samannāgato sandhāno gahapati tathāgate niṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme iriyatī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:59_0: So pātoyeva uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya pubbaṇhasamaye buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhikkhūsu
atk-s0103a0:59_1: vihāraṃ gatesu ghare khuddakamahallakānaṃ dārakānaṃ saddena ubbāḷho satthu santike “dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti
atk-s0103a0:59_3: Tena vuttaṃ divā divassa rājagahā nikkhamīti.
atk-s0103a0:59_4: Tattha divā divassāti divasassa divā nāma majjhanhātikkamo,
atk-s0103a0:59_5: tasmiṃ divasassāpi divābhūte atikkantamatte majjhanhike nikkhamīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:59_6: Paṭisallīnoti tato tato rūpādigocarato cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā nilīno jhānaratisevanāvasena ekībhāvaṃ gato.
atk-s0103a0:59_8: Ye ca āvajjato manasikaroto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti unnamati vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0103a0:61_2: Ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataroti ayaṃ tesaṃ abbhantaro eko sāvako,
atk-s0103a0:61_3: bhagavato kira sāvakā gihianāgāminoyeva pañcasatā rājagahe paṭivasanti.
atk-s0103a0:61_4: Yesaṃ ekekassa pañca pañca upāsakasatāni parivārā,
atk-s0103a0:61_6: Appeva nāmāti tassa upasaṅkamanaṃ patthayamāno āha.
atk-s0103a0:62_1: Etadavocāti āgacchanto antarāmaggeyeva tesaṃ kathāya sutattā etaṃ aññathā kho imetiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0103a0:62_2: Tattha aññatitthiyāti dassanenapi ākappenapi kuttenapi ācārenapi vihārenapi iriyāpathenapi aññe titthiyāti aññatitthiyā.
atk-s0103a0:62_3: Saṅgamma samāgammāti saṅgantvā samāgantvā rāsi hutvā nisinnaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0103a0:62_6: Appasaddānīti vihārūpacārena gacchato addhikajanassapi saddena mandasaddāni.
atk-s0103a0:62_11: Iti sandhāno gahapati “aho mama satthā yo evarūpāni senāsanāni paṭisevatī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha uttamaṅge
atk-s0103a0:62_12: sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānento nisīdi.
atk-s0103a0:63_1: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ sandhānena gahapatinā udānaṃ udānentena vutte.
atk-s0103a0:63_2: Nigrodho paribbājako ayaṃ gahapati mama santike nisinnopi attano satthāraṃyeva thometi ukkaṃsati,
atk-s0103a0:63_4: etasmiṃ uppannakopaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa upari pātessāmīti sandhānaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0103a0:64_2: Kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapatīti kena kāraṇena kena puggalena saddhiṃ samaṇo gotamo sallapati vadati bhāsati.
atk-s0103a0:64_5: yadi vā koci samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ sallāpatthiko gaccheyya,
atk-s0103a0:64_9: svāyaṃ kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapati,
atk-s0103a0:65_3: samaṇena hi gotamena bodhimūle appamattikā paññā adhigatā,
atk-s0103a0:65_5: Yadi pana mayaṃ viya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ katvā nisīdeyya,
atk-s0103a0:65_7: Aparisāvacaroti avisāradattā parisaṃ otarituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0103a0:65_8: Nālaṃ sallāpāyāti na samattho sallāpaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:65_9: Antamantānevāti koci maṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyāti pañhābhīto antamantāneva pantasenāsanāni sevati.
atk-s0103a0:65_13: Sā kira kāṇakkhibhāvena vanantābhimukhīpi na sakkoti bhavituṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:65_14: Yasmā pattena vā sākhāya vā kaṇṭakena vā pahārassa bhāyati.
atk-s0103a0:65_15: Gunnaṃ abhimukhīpi na sakkoti bhavituṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:65_16: Yasmā siṅgena vā kaṇṇena vā vālena vā pahārassa bhāyati.
atk-s0103a0:65_21: Pūritaghaṭo hi ito cito ca parivattetvā na suvinandhanīyo hoti.
atk-s0103a0:65_22: Rittako yathāruci parivattetvā sakkā hoti vinandhituṃ,
atk-s0103a0:65_23: evameva hatapaññatāya rittakumbhisadisaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vādavinandhanena samantā vinandhissāmāti vadati.
atk-s0103a0:66_0: Iti paribbājako satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ nalāṭamaṇḍalaṃ apassanto dasabalassa parammukhā attano balaṃ dīpento
atk-s0103a0:66_1: asambhinnaṃ khattiyakumāraṃ jātiyā ghaṭṭayanto caṇḍālaputto viya asambhinnakesarasīhaṃ migarājānaṃ thāmena
atk-s0103a0:66_2: ghaṭṭento jarasiṅgālo viya ca nānappakāraṃ tucchagajjitaṃ gajji.
atk-s0103a0:66_3: Upāsakopi cintesi “ayaṃ paribbājako ati viya gajjati,
atk-s0103a0:66_5: bhavaggaggahaṇatthāya hatthaṃ pasārayanto viya niratthakaṃ vāyamati.
atk-s0103a0:66_7: imassa paribbājakassa yāva bhavaggā ussitaṃ mānaddhajaṃ ṭhānasova opāteyyā”ti.
atk-s0103a0:67_0: 54. Bhagavāpi tesaṃ taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ assosiyeva. Tena vuttaṃ “assosi kho imaṃ kathāsallāpa”nti.
atk-s0103a0:68_1: yassā tīre nisinno aññataro puriso padumanāḷantarehi asurabhavanaṃ pavisantaṃ asurasenaṃ addasa.
atk-s0103a0:68_3: yattha morānaṃ abhayena saddhiṃ nivāpo dinno,
atk-s0103a0:68_11: dhammo yena bhagavatā sāvakā vinītā ajjhāsayādibrahmacariyabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ pūretvā arahattādhigamavasena assāsapattā paṭijānantī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:70_3: ahametaṃ niṭṭhapetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassemīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi.
atk-s0103a0:71_1: Dujjānaṃ khoti bhagavā paribbājakassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ paribbājako mayā sāvakānaṃ desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ tehi pūretabbaṃ paṭipattiṃ pucchati,
atk-s0103a0:71_5: handāhaṃ etasseva visaye pañhaṃ pucchāpetvā puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhiyā niratthakabhāvaṃ dassemi.
atk-s0103a0:71_6: Atha pacchā imaṃ pañhaṃ byākarissāmī”ti cintetvā dujjānaṃ kho etantiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:71_12: Kathaṃ aparipuṇṇāti kathaṃ aparisuddhā hotīti evaṃ pucchāti.
atk-s0103a0:72_5: ime pana ādito paṭṭhāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ anuvattanti ceva pasaṃsanti ca,
atk-s0103a0:72_6: handāhaṃ ime nissadde katvā sayaṃ kathemī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:74_3: Tapaṃ samādiyatīti acelakabhāvādikaṃ tapaṃ sammā ādiyati,
atk-s0103a0:74_5: Attamano hotīti ko añño mayā sadiso imasmiṃ tape atthīti tuṭṭhamano hoti.
atk-s0103a0:74_10: so teneva dhutaṅgena ko añño mayā sadiso dhutaṅgadharoti attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
atk-s0103a0:74_11: Tapassino upakkileso hotīti duvidhassāpetassa tapassino ayaṃ upakkileso hoti.
atk-s0103a0:75_0: Attānukkaṃsetīti “ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti attānaṃ ukkaṃsati ukkhipati.
atk-s0103a0:75_1: Paraṃ vambhetīti “ayaṃ na mādiso”ti paraṃ saṃhāreti avakkhipati.
atk-s0103a0:77_1: Lābhasakkārasilokanti ettha cattāro paccayā labbhantīti lābhā,
atk-s0103a0:77_2: teyeva suṭṭhu katvā paṭisaṅkharitvā laddhā sakkāro,
atk-s0103a0:77_4: Abhinibbattetīti acelakādibhāvaṃ terasadhutaṅgasamādānaṃ vā nissāya mahālābho uppajjati,
atk-s0103a0:77_6: Sesamettha purimavāranayeneva duvidhassāpi tapassino vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:78_8: Tassa evaṃ hoti “idāni evarūpaṃ kadā labhissāma,
atk-s0103a0:78_13: tvameva bhuñjā”ti jīvitaṃ pariccajanto viya sāpekkho pajahati.
atk-s0103a0:78_18: āvuso”ti dhammanimantanamattampi akatvā mahante mahante kabaḷe karoti.
atk-s0103a0:79_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “asanivicakkaṃ imassa dantakūṭaṃ mūlabījādīsu na kiñci na saṃbhuñjati.
atk-s0103a0:79_4: Atha ca pana naṃ samaṇappavādena samaṇoti sañjānantī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:79_9: so aññaṃ evaṃ apasādeti “kiṃ samaṇā nāma ime samaṇamhāti vadanti,
atk-s0103a0:79_12: Lūkhājīvinti acelakādivasena vā dhutaṅgavasena vā lūkhājīviṃ.
atk-s0103a0:80_1: Āpāthakanisādī hotīti manussānaṃ āpāthe dassanaṭṭhāne nisīdati.
atk-s0103a0:80_7: Sāsane pabbajitopi samādinnadhutaṅgo sabbarattiṃ sayitvā manussānaṃ cakkhupathe tapaṃ karoti,
atk-s0103a0:80_10: manussānaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā cīvaraṃ matthake ṭhapetvā caṅkamaṃ otarati,
atk-s0103a0:81_0: Attānanti attano guṇaṃ adassayamānoti ettha a-
atk-s0103a0:81_3: Idampi me tapasminti idampi kammaṃ mameva tapasmiṃ,
atk-s0103a0:81_6: So hi asukasmiṃ ṭhāne acelako atthi muttācārotiādīni sutvā amhākaṃ esa tapo,
atk-s0103a0:81_8: Asukasmiṃ vā pana ṭhāne paṃsukūliko bhikkhu atthītiādīni sutvā amhākaṃ esa tapo,
atk-s0103a0:82_1: Paṭicchannaṃ sevatīti yathā aññe na jānanti,
atk-s0103a0:82_3: Akkhamamānaṃ āha khamatīti aruccamānaṃyeva ruccati meti vadati.
atk-s0103a0:82_4: Attanā kataṃ atimahantampi vajjaṃ appamattakaṃ katvā paññapeti,
atk-s0103a0:82_5: parena kataṃ dukkaṭamattaṃ vītikkamampi pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:84_0: Issukī hoti maccharīti parasakkārādīsu usūyanalakkhaṇāya issāya,
atk-s0103a0:84_1: āvāsakulalābhavaṇṇadhammesu maccharāyanalakkhaṇena pañcavidhamaccherena ca samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0103a0:84_5: atikkamitvā maññanalakkhaṇena atimānena ca samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0103a0:84_6: Pāpiccho hotīti asantasambhāvanapatthanalakkhaṇāya pāpicchatāya samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0103a0:84_7: Pāpikānanti tāsaṃyeva lāmakānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gato.
atk-s0103a0:84_9: Antaggāhikāyāti sāyeva diṭṭhi ucchedantassa gahitattā “antaggāhikā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0103a0:84_15: Ariṭṭho viya na sakkā hoti paṭinissajjāpetunti duppaṭinissaggī.
atk-s0103a0:86_1: tapassīti evaṃ bhagavā aññatitthiyehi gahitaladdhiṃ tesaṃ rakkhitaṃ tapaṃ sabbameva saṃkiliṭṭhanti upakkilesapāḷiṃ
atk-s0103a0:86_5: Sabbavāresu ca lūkhatapassino ceva dhutaṅgadharassa ca vasena yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:86_6: Evaṃ so tasmiṃ ṭhāne parisuddho hotīti evaṃ so tena na attamanatā na paripuṇṇasaṅkappabhāvasaṅkhātena kāraṇena parisuddho nirupakkileso hoti,
atk-s0103a0:86_7: uttari vāyamamāno kammaṭṭhānasuddhiko hutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0103a0:87_2: bhanteti bhante evaṃ sante ekaṃseneva vīriyena pāpajigucchanavādo parisuddho hotīti anujānāti.
atk-s0103a0:87_3: Ito parañca aggabhāvaṃ vā sārabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto aggappattā sārappattā cāti āha.
atk-s0103a0:87_4: Athassa bhagavā sārappattabhāvaṃ paṭisedhento na kho nigrodhātiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:87_5: Papaṭikappattā hotīti sāravato rukkhassa sāraṃ phegguṃ tacañca atikkamma bahipapaṭikasadisā hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:89_1: Aggaṃ pāpetūti desanāvasena aggaṃ pāpetvā desetu,
atk-s0103a0:89_4: Na pāṇaṃ atipātetīti pāṇaṃ na hanati.
atk-s0103a0:89_5: Na bhāvitamāsīsatīti bhāvitaṃ nāma tesaṃ saññāya pañca kāmaguṇā,
atk-s0103a0:89_6: te na āsīsati na sevatīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:90_0: Aduṃ cassa hotīti etañcassa idāni vuccamānaṃ “so abhiharatī”tiādilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:90_2: Tattha so abhiharatīti so taṃ sīlaṃ abhiharati,
atk-s0103a0:90_7: No hīnāyāvattatīti hīnāya gihibhāvatthāya na āvattati.
atk-s0103a0:90_9: evaṃ karonto so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati.
atk-s0103a0:91_3: tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā cā”ti idaṃ bhagavā titthiyānaṃ vasenāha.
atk-s0103a0:91_15: Iti bhagavatā attano sāsanaṃ onatavinataphalabhārabharitarukkhūpamāya upamitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:91_16: So desanākusalatāya tato tacasārasampattito mama sāsanaṃ uttaritarañceva paṇītatarañca,
atk-s0103a0:91_17: taṃ tuvaṃ kadā jānissasīti attanodesanāya visesabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “iti kho nigrodhā”ti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:91_18: Te paribbājakāti te tassa parivārā tiṃsasatasaṅkhyā paribbājakā.
atk-s0103a0:91_35: Ito bhiyyo uttaritaranti ito dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamato bhiyyo aññaṃ uttaritaraṃ visesādhigamaṃ mayaṃ sutivasenāpi na jānāmāti vadanti.
atk-s0103a0:93_1: Atha nigrodhaṃ paribbājakanti evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ime paribbājakā idāni bhagavato bhāsitaṃ sussūsanti,
atk-s0103a0:93_2: iminā ca nigrodhena bhagavato parammukhā kakkhaḷaṃ durāsadavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:93_4: kālo dāni me imassa mānaddhajaṃ nipātetvā bhagavato sāsanaṃ ukkhipitu”nti.
atk-s0103a0:93_6: Aparampissa ahosi “ayaṃ mayi akathente satthāraṃ na khamāpessati,
atk-s0103a0:93_11: Aparisāvacaraṃ pana naṃ karothāti ettha panāti nipāto,
atk-s0103a0:94_0: Gokāṇanti etthāpi gokāṇaṃ pariyantacāriniṃ viya karothāti attho.
atk-s0103a0:95_1: Buddho so bhagavā bodhāyāti sayaṃ buddho sattānampi catusaccabodhatthāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0103a0:97_6: idaṃ sabbampi bhagavā dandhapaññaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāyāha asaṭho pana amāyāvī ujujātiko taṃmuhutteneva arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkhissati.
atk-s0103a0:97_8: mayāpi na sakkā anusāsitunti dīpento paribbājakaṃ pādesu gahetvā mahāmerupādatale viya khipittha. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:97_10: kuṭilacitto satthari evaṃ kathentepi buddhadhammasaṅghesu nādhimuccati,
atk-s0103a0:97_13: Tasmā bhagavā tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “etu viññū puriso asaṭho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:98_4: Yo eva vo ācariyoti yo eva tumhākaṃ pakatiyā ācariyo.
atk-s0103a0:98_5: Uddesā no cāvetukāmoti attano anusāsaniṃ gāhāpetvā amhe amhākaṃ uddesato cāvetukāmo.
atk-s0103a0:98_6: So eva vo uddeso hotūti yo tumhākaṃ pakatiyā uddeso,
atk-s0103a0:98_11: Akusalā dhammāti dvādasa akusalacittuppādadhammā taṇhāyeva vā visesena.
atk-s0103a0:98_23: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tato tumhe maggapaññañceva phalapaññañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā”ti.
atk-s0103a0:98_24: Evaṃ bhagavā paribbājake ārabbha attano ovādānusāsaniyā phalaṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0103a0:99_1: Yathā taṃ mārenāti yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittā nisīdanti evameva tuṇhībhūtā…pe…
atk-s0103a0:100_0: Māro kira satthā ativiya gajjanto buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā imesaṃ paribbājakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0103a0:100_2: handāhaṃ pariyuṭṭhāmīti so tesaṃ cittāni pariyuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0103a0:100_4: Tepi mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittā thaddhaṅgapaccaṅgā viya tuṇhī appaṭibhānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:100_5: Atha satthā ime paribbājakā ativiya niravā hutvā nisinnā,
atk-s0103a0:100_6: kiṃ nu khoti āvajjanto mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0103a0:100_11: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavato etadahosi sabbepi me moghapurisā”tiādi.
atk-s0103a0:101_0: Tattha phuṭṭhā pāpimatāti pāpimatā mārena phuṭṭhā.
atk-s0103a0:101_3: Kiṃ karissati sattāhoti samaṇena gotamena paricchinnasattāho amhākaṃ kiṃ karissati.
atk-s0103a0:101_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “samaṇena gotamena ‘sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati sattāha’nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:101_5: so sattāho amhākaṃ kiṃ apphāsukaṃ karissati.
atk-s0103a0:101_6: Handa mayaṃ sattāhabbhantare etaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0103a0:101_8: Atha vā jānāma tāvassa dhammanti ekadivase ekavāraṃ aññāṇatthampi etesaṃ cittaṃ nuppannaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:101_9: sattāho pana etesaṃ kusītānaṃ kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0103a0:101_10: kiṃ sakkhissanti te sattāhaṃ pūretunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0103a0:101_15: Tesaṃ pana paribbājakānaṃ kiñcāpi idaṃ suttantaṃ sutvā viseso na nibbatto,
atk-s0103a0:101_16: āyatiṃ pana nesaṃ vāsanāya paccayo bhavissatīti.
atk-s0103a0:104_4: Taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā avidūre vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0103a0:104_5: “Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī”ti ettha ayamanupubbikathā –
atk-s0103a0:105_0: Bhagavā kira imassa suttassa samuṭṭhānasamaye paccūsakāle mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0103a0:105_1: imāya anāgatavaṃsadīpikāya suttantakathāya mātulanagaravāsīnaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ
atk-s0103a0:105_3: Mātulanagaravāsino khattiyā “bhagavā āgato”ti sutvā paccuggamma dasabalaṃ nimantetvā mahāsakkārena nagaraṃ
atk-s0103a0:105_4: pavesetvā nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidhāya bhagavantaṃ mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0103a0:105_7: “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne imesaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmi,
atk-s0103a0:105_9: manussānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0103a0:106_0: Atha rājakulānaṃ bhattānumodanaṃ akatvāva pattaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhami.
atk-s0103a0:106_4: buddhānaṃ nāma na sakkā cittaṃ gahetuṃ,
atk-s0103a0:106_5: buddhehi saddhiṃ vissāsakaraṇaṃ nāma samussitaphaṇaṃ āsīvisaṃ gīvāya gahaṇasadisaṃ hoti; etha bho,
atk-s0103a0:106_8: Bhagavā gacchantova magadhakkhette ṭhitaṃ sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ sandacchāyaṃ karīsamattabhūmipatthaṭaṃ
atk-s0103a0:106_9: ekaṃ mātularukkhaṃ disvā imasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā dhamme desiyamāne “mahājanassa ṭhānanisajjanokāso
atk-s0103a0:106_11: Nivattitvā maggā okkamma rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattheraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0103a0:106_12: Thero olokitasaññāya eva “satthā nisīditukāmo”ti ñatvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ paññapetvā adāsi.
atk-s0103a0:106_17: evaṃ mahāparisamajjhagato tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0103a0:107_0: Te bhikkhūti tatra upaviṭṭhā dhammappaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū.
atk-s0103a0:107_1: Attadīpāti attānaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gatiṃ parāyaṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharathāti attho.
atk-s0103a0:107_4: Na hi añño aññassa saraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:108_6: Na lacchatīti na labhissati na passissati.
atk-s0103a0:108_11: Ayaṃ panattho leḍḍuṭṭhānato nikkhamma toraṇe nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapantaṃ lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0103a0:109_2: sakuṇagghi lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi. Atha kho,
atk-s0103a0:109_4: lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṃ paridevasi ‘mayamevamha alakkhikā,
atk-s0103a0:109_7: sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
atk-s0103a0:109_8: na myāyaṃ sakuṇagghi alaṃ abhavissa yadidaṃ yuddhāyā’ti.
atk-s0103a0:109_9: Ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayoti?
atk-s0103a0:109_12: sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ pamuñci gaccha kho tvaṃ lāpa,
atk-s0103a0:110_2: lāpo sakuṇo naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṃ leḍḍuṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā sakuṇagghiṃ vadamāno aṭṭhāsi “ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi,
atk-s0103a0:110_6: sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā. Yadā kho,
atk-s0103a0:110_8: aññāsi lāpo sakuṇo bahuāgatā kho myāyaṃ sakuṇagghīti,
atk-s0103a0:110_9: atha kho tasseva leḍḍussa antaraṃ paccupādi. Atha kho,
atk-s0103a0:111_10: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
atk-s0103a0:111_11: sotaviññeyyā saddā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
atk-s0103a0:111_12: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
atk-s0103a0:111_13: jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
atk-s0103a0:111_14: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā. Ayaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:112_3: na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ. Ko ca,
atk-s0103a0:112_9: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
atk-s0103a0:112_11: vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
atk-s0103a0:112_13: citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
atk-s0103a0:112_15: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
atk-s0103a0:113_2: Evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti evaṃ idaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ puññaphalaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0103a0:113_3: puññaphalanti ca uparūpari puññampi puññavipākopi veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:115_1: Tattha duvidhaṃ kusalaṃ vaṭṭagāmī ca vivaṭṭagāmī ca.
atk-s0103a0:115_2: Tattha vaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ nāma mātāpitūnaṃ puttadhītāsu puttadhītānañca mātāpitūsu sinehavasena mudumaddavacittaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:116_2: yadā puttadhītaro mātāpitūnaṃ ovāde na aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0103a0:117_3: Taṃ kira cakkaratanaṃ antepuradvāre akkhāhataṃ viya vehāsaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0103a0:117_4: Athassa ubhosu passesu dve khadiratthambhe nikhaṇitvā cakkaratanamatthake nemiabhimukhaṃ ekaṃ suttakaṃ bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:117_6: Tesu uparimasuttato appamattakampi ogataṃ cakkaratanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0103a0:117_7: heṭṭhā suttassa ṭhānaṃ uparimakoṭiyā atikkantagataṃ ṭhānā cutaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0103a0:117_9: Suttamattampi ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattaṃ vā bhaṭṭhaṃ ṭhānā cutameva hoti.
atk-s0103a0:118_1: tvaṃ ajja ādiṃ katvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ cakkaratanassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha,
atk-s0103a0:118_2: evaṃ gacchanto yadā cakkaratanaṃ īsakampi osakkitaṃ ṭhānā cutaṃ passasi,
atk-s0103a0:118_5: Addasāti appamatto divasassa tikkhattuṃ gantvā olokento ekadivasaṃ addasa.
atk-s0103a0:119_2: atha rājā daḷhanemi “cakkaratanaṃ osakkita”nti sutvā uppannabalavadomanasso “na dāni mayā ciraṃ jīvitabbaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0103a0:119_5: pabbajjākālo me idānī”ti roditvā paridevitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ āmantāpetvā etadavoca.
atk-s0103a0:119_11: Kesamassunti tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārenti.
atk-s0103a0:120_1: Ādito evaṃ katvā pacchā vakkalānipi dhārenti.
atk-s0103a0:120_7: Antaradhāyīti antarahitaṃ nibbutadīpasikhā viya abhāvaṃ upagataṃ.
atk-s0103a0:120_9: Pettikanti pitito āgataṃ dāyajjaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0103a0:120_10: na sakkā kusītena hīnavīriyena dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattantena pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0103a0:120_11: Attano pana sukataṃ kammaṃ nissāya dasavidhaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattivattaṃ pūrentenevetaṃ pattabbanti dīpeti.
atk-s0103a0:122_2: Nissāyāti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0103a0:122_3: Dhammaṃ sakkarontoti yathā kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti,
atk-s0103a0:122_5: Dhammaṃ garuṃ karontoti tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā taṃ garuṃ karonto.
atk-s0103a0:122_6: Dhammaṃ mānentoti tameva dhammaṃ piyañca bhāvanīyañca katvā viharanto.
atk-s0103a0:122_7: Dhammaṃ pūjentoti taṃ apadisitvā gandhamālādipūjanenassa pūjaṃ karonto.
atk-s0103a0:122_8: Dhammaṃ apacayamānoti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi nīcavuttitaṃ karonto.
atk-s0103a0:122_9: Dhammaddhajo dhammaketūti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā ketumiva ca ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho.
atk-s0103a0:122_10: Dhammādhipateyyoti dhammādhipatibhūto āgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo hutvā.
atk-s0103a0:122_11: Dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahassūti dhammo assā atthīti dhammikā,
atk-s0103a0:122_12: rakkhā ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti.
atk-s0103a0:122_13: Tattha “paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī”ti vacanato khantiādayo rakkhā.
atk-s0103a0:122_20: taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu saṃvidahassu pavattaya ṭhapehīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:124_6: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossajjanasaṅkhātā pamādā ca paṭiviratā.
atk-s0103a0:124_7: Khantisoracce niviṭṭhāti adhivāsanakhantiyañca suratabhāve ca patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0103a0:124_8: Ekamattānanti attano rāgādīnaṃ damanādīhi ekamattānaṃ damenti samenti parinibbāpentīti vuccanti.
atk-s0103a0:124_10: Abhinivajjeyyāsīti gūthaṃ viya visaṃ viya aggiṃ viya ca suṭṭhu vajjeyyāsi.
atk-s0103a0:124_11: Samādāyāti surabhikusumadāmaṃ viya amataṃ viya ca sammā ādāya pavatteyyāsi.
atk-s0103a0:125_9: adhanānaṃ dhanānuppadānaṃ ekaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchanaṃ ekanti evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:125_10: Gahapatike pana pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gaṇentassa dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:125_11: Pubbe avuttaṃ vā gaṇentena adhammarāgassa ca visamalobhassa ca pahānavasena dvādasavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:125_12: Idaṃ kho tāta tanti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ dvādasavidhañca ariyacakkavattivattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:126_5: porāṇakaṃ rājavaṃsaṃ rājapaveṇiṃ rājadhammaṃ pahāya attano matimatte ṭhatvā janapadaṃ anusāsatīti.
atk-s0103a0:126_6: Evamayaṃ maghadevavaṃsassa kaḷārajanako viya daḷhanemivaṃsassa upacchedako antimapuriso hutvā uppanno.
atk-s0103a0:126_9: Yathā taṃ pubbakānanti yathā pubbakānaṃ rājūnaṃ pubbe ca pacchā ca sadisāyeva hutvā pabbiṃsu,
atk-s0103a0:126_12: telamadhuphāṇitādīsu ceva yāgubhattādīsu ca ojāpi parihāyitthāti attho.
atk-s0103a0:127_0: Amaccā pārisajjāti amaccā ceva parisāvacarā ca.
atk-s0103a0:127_5: taṃ nissayaṃ katvā ye jīvanti paṇḍitā mahāmattā,
atk-s0103a0:129_1: No ca kho adhanānanti balavalobhattā pana adhanānaṃ daliddamanussānaṃ dhanaṃ nānuppadāsi.
atk-s0103a0:129_5: Attanā ca jīvāhīti sayañca jīvaṃ yāpehīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:129_9: Suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ dasannaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato saggasaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0103a0:131_1: Sīsāni nesaṃ chindissāmāti yesaṃ antamaso mūlakamuṭṭhimpi harissāma,
atk-s0103a0:131_4: amhākaṃ dāni kimettha rājāpi evaṃ uṭṭhāya paraṃ māretīti ayaṃ nesaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0103a0:132_2: “ayaṃ rājā saccaṃ devāti mukhapaṭiññāya dinnāya mārāpeti,
atk-s0103a0:134_1: Adhammarāgoti mātā mātucchā pitucchā mātulānītiādike ayuttaṭṭhāne rāgo.
atk-s0103a0:134_3: Micchādhammoti purisānaṃ purisesu itthīnañca itthīsu chandarāgo.
atk-s0103a0:135_3: Tassā abhāvo ceva tappaṭipakkhatā ca amatteyyatā.
atk-s0103a0:135_5: Na kule jeṭṭhāpacāyitāti kule jeṭṭhānaṃ apacitiyā nīcavuttiyā akaraṇabhāvo.
atk-s0103a0:137_6: Kusalantipi na bhavissatīti kusalanti nāmampi na bhavissati,
atk-s0103a0:137_8: Pujjā ca bhavissanti pāsaṃsā cāti pūjārahā ca bhavissanti pasaṃsārahā ca.
atk-s0103a0:137_9: Tadā kira manussā “asukena nāma mātā pahatā,
atk-s0103a0:137_13: aho puriso”ti tameva pūjessanti ceva pasaṃsissanti ca.
atk-s0103a0:138_0: Na bhavissati mātāti vāti ayaṃ mayhaṃ mātāti garucittaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0103a0:138_1: Gehe mātugāmaṃ viya nānāvidhaṃ asabbhikathaṃ kathayamānā agāravupacārena upasaṅkamissanti.
atk-s0103a0:139_0: Tibbo āghāto paccupaṭṭhito bhavissatīti balavakopo punappunaṃ uppattivasena paccupaṭṭhito bhavissati.
atk-s0103a0:139_3: Attano ca parassa ca hitasukhaṃ byāpādetīti byāpādo.
atk-s0103a0:139_5: Tibbaṃ vadhakacittanti piyamānassāpi paraṃ māraṇatthāya vadhakacittaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:139_6: Tassa vatthuṃ dassetuṃ mātupi puttamhītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:140_3: Antarakappo ca nāmesa dubbhikkhantarakappo rogantarakappo satthantarakappoti tividho.
atk-s0103a0:140_7: Tattha dubbhikkhantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena pettivisaye upapajjanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:140_9: Rogantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena sagge nibbattanti kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:140_10: Tesañhi “aho vataññesaṃ sattānaṃ evarūpo rogo na bhaveyyā”ti mettacittaṃ uppajjatīti.
atk-s0103a0:140_11: Satthantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena niraye upapajjanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:141_2: Tiṇhāni satthāni hatthesu pātubhavissantīti tesaṃ kira hatthena phuṭṭhamattaṃ yaṃkiñci antamaso tiṇapaṇṇaṃ upādāya āvudhameva bhavissati.
atk-s0103a0:141_3: Mā ca mayaṃ kañcīti mayaṃ kañci ekapurisampi jīvitā mā voropayimha.
atk-s0103a0:141_4: Mā ca amhe kocīti amhepi koci ekapuriso jīvitā mā voropayittha.
atk-s0103a0:141_6: na sakkā dvīhi ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitehi jīvitaṃ laddhunti maññamānā evaṃ cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:141_12: Sabhāgāyissantīti yathā ahaṃ jīvāmi diṭṭhā bho sattā,
atk-s0103a0:141_13: tvampi tathā jīvasīti evaṃ sammodanakathāya attanā sabhāge karissanti.
atk-s0103a0:143_8: Iti sīlagabbhe vaḍḍhitattā imāya khettavisuddhiyā dīghāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:143_9: Ye panettha kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattā,
atk-s0103a0:144_1: Cattārīsavassāyukātiādayo koṭṭhāsā adinnādānādīhi paṭiviratānaṃ vasena veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:146_1: Icchāti mayhaṃ bhattaṃ dethāti evaṃ uppajjanakataṇhā.
atk-s0103a0:146_3: bhattaṃ bhuttānaṃ bhattasammadapaccayā nipajjitukāmatājanako kāyadubbalabhāvoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:146_5: Kukkuṭasampātikāti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhato uppatitvā itaragāmassa chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasampāto.
atk-s0103a0:146_8: gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasampādo etāsu atthīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:146_10: Avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissatīti avīcimahānirayo viya nirantarapūrito bhavissati.
atk-s0103a0:147_3: manussesu metteyyo nāma bhagavā loke uppajjissatī”ti na vaḍḍhamānakavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:147_4: Na hi buddhā vaḍḍhamāne āyumhi nibbattanti,
atk-s0103a0:147_6: Tasmā yadā taṃ āyu vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkheyyataṃ patvā puna hāyamānaṃ asītivassasahassakāle ṭhassati,
atk-s0103a0:147_8: Pariharissatīti idaṃ pana parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:147_10: Raññā mahāpanādena kārāpitoti raññā hetubhūtena tassatthāya sakkena devarājena vissakammadevaputtaṃ pesetvā kārāpito.
atk-s0103a0:147_11: Pubbe kira dve pitāputtā naḷakārā paccekabuddhassa naḷehi ca udumbarehi ca paṇṇasālaṃ kārāpetvā taṃ tattha vāsāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:147_14: Putto devalokā cavitvā surucissa rañño deviyā sumedhāya kucchismiṃ nibbatto.
atk-s0103a0:147_16: So aparabhāge chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahāpanādo nāma rājā jāto.
atk-s0103a0:147_17: Athassa puññānubhāvena sakko devarājā vissakammadevaputtaṃ rañño pāsādaṃ karohīti pahiṇi so tassa pāsādaṃ
atk-s0103a0:148_0: “Panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo;
atk-s0103a0:151_0: Anaccuṃ tattha gandhabbā, cha sahassāni sattadhā.
atk-s0103a0:152_0: Evametaṃ tadā āsi, yathā bhāsasi bhaddaji;
atk-s0103a0:153_0: Sakko ahaṃ tadā āsiṃ, veyyāvaccakaro tavā”ti. ;
atk-s0103a0:154_0: So rājā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0103a0:154_1: Tasmiṃ devaloke nibbatte so pāsādo mahāgaṅgāya anusotaṃ pati.
atk-s0103a0:154_2: Tassa dhurasopānasammukhaṭṭhāne payāgapatiṭṭhānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:154_4: Aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle so naḷakāradevaputto devalokato cavitvā manussapathe bhaddajiseṭṭhi
atk-s0103a0:154_5: nāma hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0103a0:154_6: So nāvāya gaṅgātaraṇadivase bhikkhusaṅghassa taṃ pāsādaṃ dassetīti vatthu vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:154_9: Tena saddhiṃ puññaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattakulaputto anāgate saṅkho nāma rājā bhavissati.
atk-s0103a0:155_3: Taṃ datvā vissajjitvāti taṃ pāsādaṃ dānavasena datvā nirapekkho pariccāgavasena ca vissajjitvā.
atk-s0103a0:155_7: Kathaṃ pana so ekaṃ pāsādaṃ bahūnaṃ dassatīti?
atk-s0103a0:155_8: Evaṃ kirassa cittaṃ uppajjissati “ayaṃ pāsādo vippakiriyatū”ti.
atk-s0103a0:155_10: So taṃ alaggamānova hutvā “yo yattakaṃ icchati,
atk-s0103a0:156_0: 109. Idāni vivaṭṭagāmikusalassa anusandhiṃ dassento puna attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharathātiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:158_2: bhikkhuno āyusminti bhikkhave yaṃ vo ahaṃ āyunāpi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:158_3: tattha idaṃ bhikkhuno āyusmiṃ idaṃ āyukāraṇanti attho.
atk-s0103a0:158_4: Tasmā tumhehi āyunā vaḍḍhitukāmehi ime cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbāti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:159_0: Vaṇṇasminti yaṃ vo ahaṃ vaṇṇenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:159_2: Sīlavato hi avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vasena sarīravaṇṇopi kittivasena guṇavaṇṇopi vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0103a0:159_3: Tasmā tumhehi vaṇṇena vaḍḍhitukāmehi sīlasampannehi bhavitabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:160_0: Sukhasminti yaṃ vo ahaṃ sukhenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:160_2: Tasmā tumhehi sukhena vaḍḍhitukāmehi imāni cattāri jhānāni bhāvetabbāni.
atk-s0103a0:161_0: Bhogasminti yaṃ vo ahaṃ bhogenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:161_1: ayaṃ so appamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ appaṭikūlatāvaho sukhasayanādi ekādasānisaṃso sabbadisāvipphāritabrahmavihārabhogo.
atk-s0103a0:161_2: Tasmā tumhehi bhogena vaḍḍhitukāmehi ime brahmavihārā bhāvetabbā.
atk-s0103a0:162_0: Balasminti yaṃ vo ahaṃ balenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:162_2: Tasmā tumhehi balena vaḍḍhitukāmehi arahattappattiyā yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0103a0:163_2: mārabalanti yathā idaṃ devaputtamāramaccumārakilesamārānaṃ balaṃ duppasahaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:163_3: evaṃ aññaṃ loke ekabalampi na samanupassāmi.
atk-s0103a0:163_4: Tampi balaṃ idameva arahattaphalaṃ pasahati abhibhavati ajjhottharati.
atk-s0103a0:164_0: Evamidaṃ puññanti evaṃ idaṃ lokuttarapuññampi yāva āsavakkhayā pavaḍḍhatīti vivaṭṭagāmikusalānusandhiṃ
atk-s0103a0:167_4: Atīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0103a0:167_5: dānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0103a0:167_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0103a0:167_7: dhanañcayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0103a0:167_10: tadā pañcadāsisatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:168_0: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā.
atk-s0103a0:168_3: Patikulaṃ gacchantiyā cassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi.
atk-s0103a0:168_4: Tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0103a0:168_8: Iti etehi ca aññehi ca sattahi ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0103a0:168_9: Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati.
atk-s0103a0:168_10: Pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva naṃ itthī dhāretuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0103a0:168_11: Sā aparabhāge dasabalassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā hutvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi bhagavato vihāraṃ
atk-s0103a0:168_15: Sā “suddhapāsādova na sobhatī”ti taṃ parivāretvā pañca duvaḍḍhagehasatāni,
atk-s0103a0:169_0: Mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya visākhāya viya aññissā buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi,
atk-s0103a0:169_2: So hi catupaṇṇāsakoṭiyo vissajjetvā sāvatthiyā dakkhiṇabhāge anurādhapurassa mahāvihārasadise ṭhāne jetavanamahāvihāraṃ nāma kāresi.
atk-s0103a0:169_3: Visākhā sāvatthiyā pācīnabhāge uttaradeviyā vihārasadise ṭhāne pubbārāmaṃ nāma kāresi.
atk-s0103a0:169_4: Bhagavā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ anukampāya sāvatthiṃ nissāya viharanto imesu dvīsu vihāresu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0103a0:169_7: Tasmiṃ samaye pana bhagavā pubbārāme viharati.
atk-s0103a0:170_0: Vāseṭṭhabhāradvājāti vāseṭṭho ca sāmaṇero bhāradvājo ca.
atk-s0103a0:170_1: Bhikkhūsu parivasantīti te neva titthiyaparivāsaṃ vasanti,
atk-s0103a0:170_6: cattālīsa cattālīsa koṭivibhavā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū majjhimanikāye vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ sutvā saraṇaṃ gatā,
atk-s0103a0:170_7: tevijjasuttaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā imasmiṃ kāle bhikkhubhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamānā parivasanti.
atk-s0103a0:170_8: Abbhokāse caṅkamatīti uttaradakkhiṇena āyatassa pāsādassa puratthimadisābhāge pāsādacchāyāyaṃ yantarajjūhi
atk-s0103a0:170_9: ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ ratanasatubbedhaṃ suvaṇṇaagghikaṃ viya anilapathe vidhāvantīhi chabbaṇṇāhi buddharasmīhi
atk-s0103a0:171_1: Anucaṅkamiṃsūti añjaliṃ paggayha onatasarīrā hutvā anuvattamānā caṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:171_2: Vāseṭṭhaṃ āmantesīti so tesaṃ paṇḍitataro gahetabbaṃ vissajjetabbañca jānāti,
atk-s0103a0:171_10: Na akkosantīti dasavidhena akkosavatthunā na akkosanti.
atk-s0103a0:171_11: Na paribhāsantīti nānāvidhāya paribhavakathāya na paribhāsantīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:171_12: Iti bhagavā “brāhmaṇā ime sāmaṇere akkosanti paribhāsantī”ti jānamānova pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0103a0:171_13: Ime mayā apucchitā paṭhamataraṃ na kathessanti,
atk-s0103a0:171_19: Paripuṇṇāyāti yathāruci padabyañjanāni āropetvā āropetvā paripūritāya.
atk-s0103a0:171_20: No aparipuṇṇāyāti antarā aṭṭhapitāya nirantaraṃ pavattāya.
atk-s0103a0:172_0: Kasmā pana brāhmaṇā ime sāmaṇere akkosantīti?
atk-s0103a0:172_2: Ime hi sāmaṇerā aggabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū jambudīpe brāhmaṇānaṃ antare pākaṭā sambhāvitā
atk-s0103a0:172_4: Atha kho brāhmaṇā “apatiṭṭhā mayaṃ jātā”ti imāya appatiṭṭhatāya gāmadvārepi antogāmepi te disvā “tumhehi brāhmaṇasamayo bhinno,
atk-s0103a0:172_5: muṇḍasamaṇakassa pacchato pacchato rasagiddhā hutvā vicarathā”tiādīni ceva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo”tiādīni ca vatvā akkosanti.
atk-s0103a0:172_6: Sāmaṇerā tesu akkosantesupi kopaṃ vā āghātaṃ vā akatvā kevalaṃ bhagavatā puṭṭhā “taggha no, bhante,
atk-s0103a0:172_8: Atha ne bhagavā akkosanākāraṃ pucchanto yathā kathaṃ pana voti pucchati.
atk-s0103a0:173_0: Tattha seṭṭho vaṇṇoti jātigottādīnaṃ paññāpanaṭṭhāne brāhmaṇova seṭṭhoti dassenti.
atk-s0103a0:173_1: Hīnā aññe vaṇṇāti itare tayo vaṇṇā hīnā lāmakāti vadanti.
atk-s0103a0:173_6: Orasā mukhato jātāti ure vasitvā mukhato nikkhantā,
atk-s0103a0:173_11: Hīnamattha vaṇṇaṃ ajjhupagatāti hīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ajjhupagatā attha.
atk-s0103a0:173_17: Pādāpacceti mahābrahmuno pādānaṃ apaccabhūte pādato jāteti adhippāyo.
atk-s0103a0:174_2: brāhmaṇā porāṇaṃ assarantā evamāhaṃsū”ti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:174_9: brāhmaṇā porāṇaṃ lokuppattiṃ ananussarantā ajānantā evaṃ vadantīti.
atk-s0103a0:174_10: “Dissanti kho panā”ti evamādi tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:174_11: Tattha brāhmaṇiyoti brāhmaṇānaṃ puttappaṭilābhatthāya āvāhavivāhavasena kulaṃ ānītā brāhmaṇiyo dissanti.
atk-s0103a0:174_12: Tā kho panetā aparena samayena utuniyopi honti,
atk-s0103a0:174_17: Yonijāva samānāti brāhmaṇīnaṃ passāvamaggena jātā samānā.
atk-s0103a0:174_21: Yadi pana nesaṃ taṃ saccavacanaṃ siyā,
atk-s0103a0:176_0: Ettāvatā “mayaṃ mahābrahmuno ure vasitvā mukhato nikkhantāti vattuṃ mā labhantū”ti imaṃ mukhacchedakavādaṃ
atk-s0103a0:176_1: vatvā puna cattāropi vaṇṇā kusale dhamme samādāya vattantāva sujjhantīti dassanatthaṃ cattārome, vāseṭṭha,
atk-s0103a0:176_7: Kaṇhavipākāti vipākopi nesaṃ kaṇho dukkhoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:177_0: Sukkāti nikkilesabhāvena paṇḍarā. Sukkavipākāti vipākopi nesaṃ sukko sukhoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:178_1: Ubhayavokiṇṇesu vattamānesūti ubhayesu vokiṇṇesu missībhūtesu hutvā vattamānesu.
atk-s0103a0:178_3: Kaṇhasukkesu dhammesu viññugarahitesu ceva viññuppasatthesu ca.
atk-s0103a0:178_4: Yadettha brāhmaṇā evamāhaṃsūti ettha etesu kaṇhasukkadhammesu vattamānāpi brāhmaṇā yadetaṃ evaṃ vadanti “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo”tiādi.
atk-s0103a0:178_5: Taṃ nesaṃ viññū nānujānantīti ye loke paṇḍitā,
atk-s0103a0:178_12: Yasmā imesaṃ catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ yo bhikkhu arahaṃ…pe…
atk-s0103a0:179_0: Arahantiādipadesu cettha kilesānaṃ ārakattādīhi kāraṇehi arahaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:179_2: Satta sekkhā puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma.
atk-s0103a0:179_4: Catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu parijānanādikaraṇīyaṃ kataṃ assāti katakaraṇīyo.
atk-s0103a0:179_5: Kilesabhāro ca khandhabhāro ca ohito assāti ohitabhāro.
atk-s0103a0:179_12: Sammadaññā vimuttoti sammā hetunā kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto.
atk-s0103a0:179_15: Diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti idhattabhāve ca parattabhāve.
atk-s0103a0:181_4: So hi niviṭṭhasaddho asinā sīse chejjamānepi buddho abuddhoti vā,
atk-s0103a0:182_0: So kira satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0103a0:182_1: Atha māro dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ buddharūpaṃ māpetvā tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā “satthā āgato”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0103a0:182_2: Sūrambaṭṭho cintesi “ahaṃ idāneva satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā āgato,
atk-s0103a0:182_3: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā satthusaññāya vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0103a0:182_13: “aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ buddhā anupadhāretvā apaccakkhaṃ katvā kiñci katheyyuṃ,
atk-s0103a0:182_14: addhā ayaṃ mayhaṃ vicchindajananatthaṃ māro āgato”ti.
atk-s0103a0:182_22: tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:182_23: maggena āgatasaddhā nāma thirā silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitasineru viya acalā hoti,
atk-s0103a0:183_0: Mūlajātā patiṭṭhitāti maggamūlassa sañjātattā tena maggamūlena patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0103a0:183_2: Asaṃhāriyāti sunikhātaindakhīlo viya kenaci cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyā.
atk-s0103a0:183_3: Tassetaṃ kallaṃ vacanāyāti tassa ariyasāvakassa yuttametaṃ vattuṃ. Kinti?
atk-s0103a0:183_5: So hi bhagavantaṃ nissāya ariyabhūmiyaṃ jātoti bhagavato putto.
atk-s0103a0:183_6: Ure vasitvā mukhato nikkhantadhammaghosavasena maggaphalesu patiṭṭhitattā oraso mukhato jāto.
atk-s0103a0:183_7: Ariyadhammato jātattā ariyadhammena ca nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito.
atk-s0103a0:183_9: Taṃ kissa hetūti yadetaṃ “bhagavatomhi putto”ti vatvā “dhammajo dhammanimmito”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:183_13: Tathāgato hi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ hadayena cintetvā vācāya abhinīhari.
atk-s0103a0:184_1: Ettāvatā bhagavā seṭṭhacchedakavādaṃ dassetvā idāni aparenapi nayena seṭṭhacchedakavādameva dassetuṃ hoti kho so, vāseṭṭha,
atk-s0103a0:184_5: Tedha honti manomayāti te idha manussaloke nibbattamānāpi opapātikā hutvā maneneva nibbattāti manomayā.
atk-s0103a0:184_6: Brahmaloke viya idhāpi nesaṃ pītiyeva āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti pītibhakkhā.
atk-s0103a0:186_9: Rasasampannāti rasena sampannā pakkhittadibbojā viya hoti.
atk-s0103a0:187_0: Acchādesīti jivhagge ṭhapitamattā satta rasaharaṇīsahassāni pharitvā manāpā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0103a0:187_1: Taṇhā cassa okkamīti tattha cassa taṇhā uppajji.
atk-s0103a0:189_1: Āluppakārakaṃ upakkamiṃsu paribhuñjitunti ālopaṃ katvā piṇḍe piṇḍe chinditvā paribhuñjituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:190_9: Tesañhi sattānaṃ sayaṃpabhāya antarahitāya andhakāro ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:190_10: Te bhītatasitā “bhaddakaṃ vatassa sace āloko pātubhaveyyā”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:190_11: Tato mahājanassa sūrabhāvaṃ janayamānaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0103a0:190_13: Tasmiṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate puna andhakāro ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:190_14: Te “bhaddakaṃ vatassa sace añño āloko uppajjeyyā”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:190_15: Atha nesaṃ chandaṃ ñatvāva candamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0103a0:193_3: Candassa heṭṭhimantato sūriyassa uparimantato yojanasataṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:194_3: Cando dhenu viya vacchaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkhattaṃ upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0103a0:194_4: Nakkhattāni pana attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahanti.
atk-s0103a0:194_7: So kāḷapakkhauposathato pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati.
atk-s0103a0:194_9: Pakkhassa dutiyāya satasahassanti evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ ohāya gacchati.
atk-s0103a0:194_10: Atha cando anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā uposathadivase paripuṇṇo hoti.
atk-s0103a0:194_11: Puna pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0103a0:194_12: Dutiyāya satasahassanti evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0103a0:194_13: Atha cando anukkamena hāyitvā uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati.
atk-s0103a0:194_14: Candaṃ heṭṭhā katvā sūriyo upari hoti.
atk-s0103a0:194_15: Mahatiyā pātiyā khuddakabhājanaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ pidhīyati.
atk-s0103a0:194_16: Majjhanhike gehacchāyā viya candassa chāyā na paññāyati.
atk-s0103a0:194_17: So chāyāya apaññāyamānāya dūre ṭhitānaṃ divā padīpo viya sayampi na paññāyati.
atk-s0103a0:195_0: Kati nesaṃ vīthiyoti ettha pana ajavīthi,
atk-s0103a0:195_6: Tasmā yaṃ kālaṃ candimasūriyā ajavīthiṃ āruhanti,
atk-s0103a0:195_15: Tato pare dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi vicarantā paṭhamakattikamāse majjhena gacchanti.
atk-s0103a0:195_16: Tato cakkavāḷābhimukhā gantvā tayo māse cakkavāḷasamīpena caritvā puna nikkhamitvā citramāse majjhena
atk-s0103a0:195_17: gantvā tato dve māse sinerubhimukhā pakkhanditvā puna āsāḷhe sinerusamīpena caranti.
atk-s0103a0:196_1: Ekappahārena tīsu dīpesu ālokaṃ karonti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0103a0:196_2: Imasmiñhi dīpe sūriyuggamanakālo pubbavidehe majjhanhiko hoti,
atk-s0103a0:197_0: Nakkhattāni tārakarūpānīti kattikādinakkhattāni ceva sesatārakarūpāni ca candimasūriyehi saddhiṃyeva pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:197_1: Rattindivāti tato sūriyatthaṅgamanato yāva aruṇuggamanā ratti,
atk-s0103a0:197_2: aruṇuggamanato yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā divāti evaṃ rattindivā paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:197_4: dve aḍḍhamāsā māsoti evaṃ māsaḍḍhamāsā paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:197_6: tayo utū saṃvaccharoti evaṃ utusaṃvaccharā paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:198_2: Tesaṃ vaṇṇātimānapaccayāti tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ārabbha uppannaatimānapaccayā.
atk-s0103a0:198_4: Rasāya pathaviyāti sampannarasattā rasāti laddhanāmāya pathaviyā.
atk-s0103a0:198_6: Aho rasanti aho amhākaṃ madhurarasaṃ antarahitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:200_2: antovāpiyaṃ udake chinne sukkhakalalapaṭalaṃ viya ca uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0103a0:201_3: Ahu vata noti madhurarasā vata no padālatā ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:201_4: Ahāyi vata noti sā no etarahi antarahitāti.
atk-s0103a0:202_6: Pakkaṃ paṭivirūḷhanti sāyaṃ gahitaṭṭhānaṃ pāto pakkaṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:202_7: puna virūḷhaṃ paṭipākatikameva gahitaṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-s0103a0:202_8: Nāpadānaṃ paññāyatīti alāyitaṃ hutvā anūnameva paññāyati.
atk-s0103a0:204_1: Itthiyā cāti yā pubbe manussakāle itthī,
atk-s0103a0:204_4: Mātugāmo nāma hi purisattabhāvaṃ labhanto anupubbena purisattapaccaye dhamme pūretvā labhati.
atk-s0103a0:204_5: Puriso itthattabhāvaṃ labhanto kāmesumicchācāraṃ nissāya labhati.
atk-s0103a0:205_2: Tadetarahi dhammasammatanti taṃ idāni dhammoti sammataṃ,
atk-s0103a0:205_4: Tathā hi ekaccesu jānapadesu kalahaṃ kurumānā itthiyo “tvaṃ kasmā kathesi?
atk-s0103a0:205_8: Apadānaṃ paññāyitthāti chinnaṭṭhānaṃ ūnameva hutvā paññāyittha.
atk-s0103a0:205_9: Saṇḍasaṇḍāti ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne kalāpabandhā viya gumbagumbā hutvā.
atk-s0103a0:206_2: Yatra hi nāmāti yo hi nāma.
atk-s0103a0:206_3: Pāṇinā pahariṃsūti tayo vāre vacanaṃ agaṇhantaṃ pāṇinā pahariṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:208_1: Khīyitabbaṃ khīyeyyāti pakāsetabbaṃ pakāseyya khipitabbaṃ khipeyya,
atk-s0103a0:208_3: Yo nesaṃ sattoti yo tesaṃ satto.
atk-s0103a0:208_6: Sālīnaṃ bhāgaṃ anupadassāmāti mayaṃ ekekassa khettato ambaṇambaṇaṃ āharitvā tuyhaṃ sālibhāgaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0103a0:209_1: Akkharaṃ upanibbattanti saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro uppanno.
atk-s0103a0:209_2: Khattiyo khattiyotveva dutiyaṃ akkharanti na kevalaṃ akkharameva,
atk-s0103a0:209_3: te panassa khettasāmino tīhi saṅkhehi abhisekampi akaṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:209_6: agge vā ñātena lokuppattisamaye uppannena abhinibbatti ahosīti.
atk-s0103a0:211_4: Tamenaṃ manussā disvāti te ete manussā passitvā.
atk-s0103a0:211_6: Ganthe karontāti tayo vede abhisaṅkharontā ceva vācentā ca.
atk-s0103a0:211_10: Hīnasammatanti “mante dhārenti mante vācentī”ti kho, vāseṭṭha,
atk-s0103a0:211_12: Tadetarahi seṭṭhasammatanti taṃ idāni “ettake mante dhārenti ettake mante vācentī”ti seṭṭhasammataṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:212_2: Visukammante payojesunti gorakkha vāṇijakammādike vissute uggate kammante payojesuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:213_1: Suddā suddāti tena luddācārakammakhuddācārakammunā suddaṃ suddaṃ lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0103a0:214_1: Sakaṃ dhammaṃ garahamānoti na setacchattaṃ ussāpanamattena sujjhituṃ sakkāti evaṃ attano khattiyadhammaṃ nindamāno.
atk-s0103a0:214_4: catūhi maṇḍalehī”ti iminā imaṃ dasseti “samaṇamaṇḍalaṃ nāma visuṃ natthi,
atk-s0103a0:214_5: yasmā pana na sakkā jātiyā sujjhituṃ,
atk-s0103a0:214_7: Tasmā imehi catūhi maṇḍalehi samaṇamaṇḍalassa abhinibbatti hoti.
atk-s0103a0:214_11: Samaṇamaṇḍalañhi āgamma sammāpaṭipattiṃ pūretvā suddhiṃ pāpuṇantī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:217_3: Sukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī hotīti ekakkhaṇe ubhayavipākadānaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0103a0:217_4: Yena pana akusalaṃ bahuṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:217_6: so taṃ kusalaṃ nissāya khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattati.
atk-s0103a0:217_7: Atha naṃ akusalakammaṃ kāṇampi karoti khujjampi pīṭhasappimpi.
atk-s0103a0:217_9: abhisittakāle vā evaṃbhūto bhoge paribhuñjituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0103a0:217_10: Aparassa maraṇakāle dve balavamallā viya te dvepi kusalākusalakammāni upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0103a0:217_14: Tamenaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ vā karonti maṅgalaassaṃ vā maṅgalausabhaṃ vā.
atk-s0103a0:219_6: Iti bhagavā cattāro vaṇṇe dassetvā vinivattetvā paṭividdhacatusaccaṃ khīṇāsavameva devamanussesu seṭṭhaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0103a0:220_1: Idāni tamevatthaṃ lokasammatassa brahmunopi vacanadassanānusārena daḷhaṃ katvā dassento imesañhi vāseṭṭha catunnaṃ vaṇṇānantiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:220_3: Iti bhagavā ettakena iminā kathāmaggena seṭṭhacchedakavādameva dassetvā suttantaṃ vinivattetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0103a0:220_4: Attamanā vāseṭṭhabhāradvājāti vāseṭṭhabhāradvāja sāmaṇerāpi hi sakamanā tuṭṭhamanā “sādhu,
atk-s0103a0:220_6: Idameva suttantaṃ āvajjantā anumajjantā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0103a0:223_7: So bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyātesi.
atk-s0103a0:223_8: So vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya “pāvārikambavana”ntveva saṅkhyaṃ gato,
atk-s0103a0:224_1: thero kira taṃdivasaṃ kālasseva sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā sunivatthanivāsano pattacīvaramādāya pāsādikehi
atk-s0103a0:224_2: abhikkantādīhi devamanussānaṃ pasādaṃ āvahanto nāḷandavāsīnaṃ hitasukhamanubrūhayanto piṇḍāya pavisitvā
atk-s0103a0:224_3: pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ gantvā satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0103a0:224_5: Tattha saddhivihārikantevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0103a0:224_6: udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītale katvā tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0103a0:225_0: So yathāparicchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya attano guṇe anussaritumāraddho.
atk-s0103a0:225_2: Tato paṭipāṭiyāva samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0103a0:225_3: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti viññānañcāyatanasamāpatti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti
atk-s0103a0:225_4: vipassanāñāṇaṃ manomayiddhiñāṇaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ dibbasotañāṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0103a0:225_7: arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:225_8: Ito paṭṭhāya kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassībuddhassa pādamūle kataṃ abhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0103a0:225_9: ādiṃ katvā attano guṇe anussarato yāva nisinnapallaṅkā guṇā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0103a0:226_0: Evaṃ thero attano guṇe anussaramāno guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedaṃ vā daṭṭhuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0103a0:226_2: “mayhaṃ tāva padesañāṇe ṭhitassa sāvakassa guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedo vā natthi.
atk-s0103a0:226_3: Ahaṃ pana yaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajito,
atk-s0103a0:226_4: kīdisā nu kho tassa guṇā”ti dasabalassa guṇe anussarituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0103a0:226_8: cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde cattāro magge cattāri phalāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ
atk-s0103a0:226_9: cattāro ariyavaṃse nissāya dasabalassa guṇe anussaritumāraddho.
atk-s0103a0:228_0: Tasmiṃyeva ca divāṭṭhāne nisinnoyeva upari “aparaṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0103a0:228_19: iminā ca iminā ca anuttaro”ti evaṃ dasabalassa guṇe anussaranto bhagavato guṇānaṃ neva antaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:228_21: Thero attanopi tāva guṇānaṃ antaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā nāddasa,
atk-s0103a0:228_23: Yassa yassa hi paññā mahatī ñāṇaṃ visadaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:228_25: Lokiyamahājano ukkāsitvāpi khipitvāpi “namo buddhāna”nti attano attano upanissaye ṭhatvā buddhānaṃ guṇe anussarati.
atk-s0103a0:228_26: Sabbalokiyamahājanato eko sotāpanno buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahati.
atk-s0103a0:228_29: Anāgāmīnaṃ satatopi sahassatopi eko arahā buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahati.
atk-s0103a0:228_30: Avasesaarahantehi asīti mahātherā buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahanti.
atk-s0103a0:228_34: sāriputtattheratopi eko paccekabuddho buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahati.
atk-s0103a0:228_35: Sace pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe saṅghāṭikaṇṇena saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ pahariyamānā nisinnā paccekabuddhā buddhaguṇe anussareyyuṃ,
atk-s0103a0:228_36: tehi sabbehipi eko sabbaññubuddhova buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahati.
atk-s0103a0:229_0: Seyyathāpi nāma mahājano “mahāsamuddo gambhīro uttāno”ti jānanatthaṃ yottāni vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0103a0:229_12: samuddamajjhe uggatapabbatādimhi vā ṭhatvā attano attano yottaṃ otāreyyuṃ,
atk-s0103a0:229_21: evameva ekabyāmayottato paṭṭhāya navabyāmayottena ñātaudakaṃ viya lokiyamahājanena diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:229_22: Dasabyāmayottena dasabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya sotāpannena diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_23: Vīsatibyāmayottena vīsatibyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya sakadāgāminā diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_24: Tiṃsabyāmayottena tiṃsabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya anāgāminā diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_25: Cattālīsabyāmayottena cattālīsabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya arahatā diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_26: Paññāsabyāmayottena paññāsabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya asītimahātherehi diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_27: Satabyāmayottena satabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya catūhi mahātherehi diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_28: Sahassabyāmayottena sahassabyāmaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya mahāmoggallānattherena diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_29: Caturāsītibyāmasahassayottena caturāsītibyāmasahassaṭṭhāne ñātaudakaṃ viya dhammasenāpatinā sāriputtattherena diṭṭhabuddhaguṇā.
atk-s0103a0:229_30: Tattha yathā so puriso mahāsamudde udakaṃ nāma na ettakaṃyeva,
atk-s0103a0:229_32: evameva āyasmā sāriputto dhammanvayena anvayabuddhiyā anumānena nayaggāhena sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā dasabalassa
atk-s0103a0:230_0: Therena hi diṭṭhabuddhaguṇehi dhammanvayena gahetabbabuddhaguṇāyeva bahutarā.
atk-s0103a0:230_2: Yathā ito nava ito navāti aṭṭhārasa yojanāni avattharitvā gacchantiyā candabhāgāya mahānadiyā puriso sūcipāsena udakaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0103a0:230_4: Yathā vā pana puriso mahāpathavito aṅguliyā paṃsuṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0103a0:230_6: Yathā vā pana puriso mahāsamuddābhimukhiṃ aṅguliṃ kareyya,
atk-s0103a0:230_8: Yathā ca puriso ākāsābhimukhiṃ aṅguliṃ kareyya,
atk-s0103a0:230_10: Evaṃ therena diṭṭhabuddhaguṇehi adiṭṭhā guṇāva bahūti veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:235_0: Evaṃ therassa attano ca satthu ca guṇe anussarato yamakamahānadīmahogho viya abbhantare pītisomanassaṃ avattharamānaṃ vāto viya bhastaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:235_1: ubbhijjitvā uggataudakaṃ viya mahārahadaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pūreti.
atk-s0103a0:235_4: yvāhaṃ evaṃvidhassa satthu santike pabbajito”ti āvajjantassa balavataraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0103a0:236_0: Atha thero “kassāhaṃ imaṃ pītisomanassaṃ āroceyya”nti cintento añño koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā
atk-s0103a0:236_1: māro vā brahmā vā mama imaṃ pasādaṃ anucchavikaṃ katvā paṭiggahetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0103a0:236_5: mādisassa samaṇasatassa vā samaṇasahassassa vā samaṇasatasahassassa vā somanassaṃ pavedentassa sabbesaṃ manaṃ gaṇhanto paṭiggahetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0103a0:236_6: Seyyathāpi nāma aṭṭhārasa yojanāni avattharamānaṃ gacchantiṃ candabhāgamahānadiṃ kusumbhā vā kandarā vā sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0103a0:236_9: evarūpānaṃ nadīnaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0103a0:236_10: na cassa tena ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati,
atk-s0103a0:236_11: evameva satthā mādisassa samaṇasatassa samaṇasahassassa samaṇasatasahassassa vā pītisomanassaṃ pavedentassa
atk-s0103a0:236_13: Sesā samaṇabrāhmaṇādayo candabhāgaṃ kusumbhakandarā viya mama somanassaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkonti.

atk-s0103a0:236_15: sāyanhasamaye pupphānaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā paggharaṇakāle satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano somanassaṃ pavedento
atk-s0103a0:236_24: arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti.
atk-s0103a0:236_25: Dve hi aggasāvakā arahattamaggeneva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ paṭilabhanti.
atk-s0103a0:237_2: Ayañhi uḷārasaddo “uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī”tiādīsu madhure āgacchati.
atk-s0103a0:237_11: Ekaṃso gahitoti anussavena vā ācariyaparamparāya vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena
atk-s0103a0:237_12: vā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viya
atk-s0103a0:238_1: neva dandhāyantena na gaggarāyantena sīhena viya uttamanādo naditoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:238_2: Kiṃ te sāriputtāti imaṃ desanaṃ kasmā ārabhīti?
atk-s0103a0:238_4: Ekacco hi sīhanādaṃ naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0103a0:238_7: Yathā dhamamānaṃ aparisuddhalohaṃ jhāyitvā jhāmaaṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0103a0:238_9: Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dāpiyamāno dātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0103a0:238_13: Tena naṃ bhagavā “anuyogakkhamo aya”nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṃ imampi desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:239_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā.
atk-s0103a0:240_2: ye te bhavissantīti atītā ca tāva niruddhā,
atk-s0103a0:240_4: evaṃ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gate tvaṃ kathaṃ jānissasi,
atk-s0103a0:240_5: anāgatabuddhānaṃ pana guṇā kinti tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0103a0:240_8: ahaṃ etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā,
atk-s0103a0:240_10: Tesañhi jānanaṃ apade ākāse padadassanaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0103a0:240_14: kiṃ pana mayhaṃ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto evamāha.
atk-s0103a0:241_2: Therassa ca viditampi atthi aviditampi atthi,
atk-s0103a0:241_3: kiṃ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṃ karoti,
atk-s0103a0:241_9: sabbaññutaññāṇe ayaṃ anuyogoti attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ akatvā aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ karoti.
atk-s0103a0:241_10: Tena idampi dīpeti “bhagavā mayhaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ natthī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:242_1: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṃ ñāṇe asati tayā evaṃ kathitanti vadati.
atk-s0103a0:243_1: Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṃ anugantvā uppannaṃ anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito.
atk-s0103a0:243_2: Sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva imināva ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0103a0:243_4: Yathā sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṃ vā pariyanto vā natthi,
atk-s0103a0:243_9: Idāni taṃ nayaggāhaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ upamāya dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0103a0:243_11: Tattha yasmā majjhimapadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu,
atk-s0103a0:243_19: Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:243_21: Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi.
atk-s0103a0:243_22: Tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa opammatthaṃ ekaṃyeva dovārikaṃ dassetuṃ ekadvāra”nti āha.
atk-s0103a0:244_0: Cetaso upakkileseti pañca nīvaraṇāni cittaṃ upakkilesenti kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti upatāpenti vibādhenti,
atk-s0103a0:244_2: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0103a0:244_5: Suppatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā hutvā.
atk-s0103a0:244_6: Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvā.
atk-s0103a0:244_7: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vā paṭivijjhiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:245_5: Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero panāha “satipaṭṭhāne vipassanāti gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyya,
atk-s0103a0:245_7: Iti thero sabbaññubuddhānaṃ nīvaraṇappahāne satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṃ viya nānattābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0103a0:246_15: dovārikassa tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannabuddhānaṃ sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-s0103a0:246_16: Ettāvatā therena bhagavā evamahaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmīti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0103a0:247_1: yena bhagavāti imaṃ desanaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0103a0:247_4: bhagavā ahaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ paṭilabhanto pañcanavutipāsaṇḍe na aññaṃ ekampi samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā sāvakapāramīñāṇampi paṭilabhiṃ,
atk-s0103a0:247_7: Upasaṅkamiṃ dhammasavanāyāti tumhe upasaṅkamanto panāhaṃ na cīvarādihetu upasaṅkamanto,
atk-s0103a0:247_13: Taṃdivasañhi thero tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ bījamāno ṭhito taṃ desanaṃ sutvā tattheva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ akāsi.
atk-s0103a0:247_14: Uttaruttaraṃ paṇītapaṇītanti uttaruttarañceva paṇītapaṇītañca katvā desesi.
atk-s0103a0:247_18: sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti evaṃ sappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā kaṇhasukkaṃ desesi,
atk-s0103a0:247_19: kaṇhaṃ desentopi ca saussāhaṃ savipākaṃ desesi,
atk-s0103a0:248_0: Tasmiṃ dhamme abhiññā idhekaccaṃ dhammaṃ dhammesu niṭṭhamagamanti tasmiṃ desite dhamme ekaccaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0103a0:248_5: kāḷavallavāsī sumatthero tāva vadati “catusaccadhammesu idāni niṭṭhagamanakāraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0103a0:248_6: Assajimahāsāvakassa hi diṭṭhadivaseyeva so paṭhamamaggena catusaccadhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gato,
atk-s0103a0:248_7: aparabhāge sūkarakhataleṇadvāre upari tīhi maggehi catusaccadhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gato,

atk-s0103a0:248_9: Lokantaravāsī cūḷasīvatthero pana “sabbaṃ tatheva vatvā imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ‘dhammesū’ti arahatte niṭṭhaṃ gato”ti āha.
atk-s0103a0:248_10: Dīghabhāṇakatipiṭakamahāsīvatthero pana “tatheva purimavādaṃ vatvā imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ‘dhammesū’ti sāvakapāramīñāṇe
atk-s0103a0:248_11: niṭṭhaṃ gato”ti vatvā “buddhaguṇā pana nayato āgatā”ti āha.
atk-s0103a0:249_0: Satthari pasīdinti evaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇadhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhiyyosomattāya “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti satthari pasīdiṃ.
atk-s0103a0:249_1: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammoti suṭṭhu akkhāto sukathito niyyāniko maggo phalatthāya niyyāti rāgadosamohanimmadanasamattho.
atk-s0103a0:250_0: Suppaṭipanno saṅghoti buddhassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghopi vaṅkādidosavirahitaṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā
atk-s0103a0:252_1: Idāni divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā samāpajjite soḷasa aparāpariyadhamme dassetuṃ aparaṃ pana bhante etadānuttariyanti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:252_3: Yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ desetīti yathā yenākārena yāya desanāya bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0103a0:252_5: Kusalesu dhammesūti tāya desanāya desitesu kusalesu dhammesupi bhagavāva anuttaroti dīpeti.
atk-s0103a0:252_8: Tatrime kusalā dhammāti tatra kusalesu dhammesūti vuttapade ime kusalā dhammā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:252_14: Tesu jātakapariyāyaṃ patvā ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0103a0:252_17: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne bāhitikasuttantapariyāyena anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

atk-s0103a0:253_7: “Idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāyā”tiādinā nayena samathavipassanāmaggavasena
atk-s0103a0:253_11: “Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā nayena samathavipassanāmaggavasena
atk-s0103a0:254_2: Samathavipassanāmaggavaseneva ca lokiyalokuttaramissakāni saddhādīni pañcindriyāni desitāni.

atk-s0103a0:254_5: Samathavipassanāmaggavaseneva lokiyalokuttaramissakāni saddhādīni pañca balāni desitāni.
atk-s0103a0:254_8: Samathavipassanā maggavaseneva lokiyalokuttaramissakā satta bojjhaṅgā desitā.
atk-s0103a0:255_2: Samathavipassanāmaggavaseneva lokiyalokuttaramissako ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo desitoti attho.
atk-s0103a0:256_1: bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayāti idaṃ kimatthaṃ āraddhaṃ?
atk-s0103a0:256_3: Sāsanassa hi na kevalaṃ maggeneva pariyosānaṃ hoti,

atk-s0103a0:256_9: Taṃ bhagavāti taṃ desanaṃ bhagavā asesaṃ sakalaṃ abhijānāti.
atk-s0103a0:256_10: Taṃ bhagavatoti taṃ desanaṃ bhagavato asesaṃ abhijānato.
atk-s0103a0:256_11: Uttari abhiññeyyaṃ natthīti taduttari abhijānitabbaṃ natthi,
atk-s0103a0:256_12: ayaṃ nāma ito añño dhammo vā puggalo vā yaṃ bhagavā na jānātīti idaṃ natthi.
atk-s0103a0:256_13: Yadabhijānaṃ añño samaṇo vāti yaṃ tumhehi anabhiññātaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:256_14: taṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā abhijānanto bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro assa,
atk-s0103a0:256_16: Yadidaṃ kusalesu dhammesūti ettha yadidanti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:256_17: kusalesu dhammesu bhagavatā uttaritaro natthīti ayametthattho.
atk-s0103a0:256_18: Iti bhagavāva kusalesu dhammesu anuttaroti dassento “imināpi kāraṇena evaṃpasanno ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0103a0:256_20: Ito paresu aparaṃ panātiādīsu visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0103a0:258_6: tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva sā vitthārato veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:259_1: āyatanapaṇṇattīsūti yāyaṃ āyatanapaṇṇattīsu ajjhattikabāhiravavatthānādivasena evaṃ desanā,
atk-s0103a0:261_8: Ayaṃ paṭhamāti ayaṃ pakatilokiyamanussānaṃ paṭhamā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0103a0:262_0: Sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamatīti okkamanto sampajāno asammūḷho hutvā okkamati.
atk-s0103a0:263_0: Ayaṃ dutiyāti ayaṃ asītimahātherānaṃ sāvakānaṃ dutiyā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0103a0:263_2: vasantā ca nikkhamantā ca na jānanti.
atk-s0103a0:264_0: Ayaṃ tatiyāti ayaṃ dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ paccekabodhisattānañca tatiyā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0103a0:264_1: Te kira kammajehi vātehi adhosirā uddhaṃpādā anekasataporise papāte viya yonimukhe khittā tāḷacchiggaḷena
atk-s0103a0:264_2: hatthī viya sambādhena yonimukhena nikkhamamānā anantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0103a0:264_3: Tena nesaṃ “mayaṃ nikkhamamhā”ti sampajānatā na hoti.
atk-s0103a0:264_4: Evaṃ pūritapāramīnampi ca sattānaṃ evarūpe ṭhāne mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti alameva gabbhāvāse nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ.
atk-s0103a0:265_0: Ayaṃ catutthāti ayaṃ sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ vasena catutthā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0103a0:265_1: Sabbaññubodhisattā hi mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi jānanti,
atk-s0103a0:265_4: nikkhamanakālepi ca te kammajavātā uddhaṃpāde adhosire katvā khipituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0103a0:265_5: dve hatthe pasāretvā akkhīni ummīletvā ṭhitakāva nikkhamanti.
atk-s0103a0:265_6: Bhavaggaṃ upādāya avīciantare añño tīsu kālesu sampajāno nāma natthi ṭhapetvā sabbaññubodhisatte.
atk-s0103a0:265_7: Teneva nesaṃ mātukucchiṃ okkamanakāle ca nikkhamanakāle ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampatīti.
atk-s0103a0:267_2: Idāni tā ādesanavidhā dassento catasso imātiādimāha.
