atk-s0103a0:829_1: Dutiyaṃ tibbakilesassa arahattaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontassa assumukhassāpi rudato parisuddhabrahmacariyacaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:829_3: Catutthaṃ cattāro paccaye alabhamānassāpi jhānavipassanāvasena sukhasamaṅgino sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:832_9: Paṭhamena ca kammassakatapaññaṃ vipassanāpaññaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā phalapaññā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:832_10: Dutiyena vacīsaccaṃ ādiṃ katvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:832_11: Tatiyena āmisapariccāgaṃ ādiṃ katvā aggamaggena kilesapariccāgo.
atk-s0103a0:832_12: Catutthena samāpattivikkhambhite kilese ādiṃ katvā aggamaggena kilesavūpasamo.
atk-s0103a0:835_6: Missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vedayati.
atk-s0103a0:835_7: Kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena pavatte dukkhaṃ vedayati.
atk-s0103a0:835_13: Ubhayavipākassa pana adānato akaṇhāsukkavipākattā akaṇhaṃ asukkanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0103a0:836_0: Sacchikaraṇīyāti paccakkhakaraṇena ceva paṭilābhena ca sacchikātabbā.
atk-s0103a0:837_0: Oghāti vaṭṭasmiṃ satte ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā.
atk-s0103a0:838_0: Vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti yogā. Te oghā viya veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:839_2: Taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaññogo nāma.
atk-s0103a0:840_1: Vaṭṭasmiṃ nāmakāyañceva rūpakāyañca ganthati bandhati palibundhatīti kāyagantho.
atk-s0103a0:841_5: Iminā suddhīti evaṃ sīlavatānaṃ gahaṇaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:841_6: Attāti etena vadati ceva upādiyati cāti attavādupādānaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:842_9: Manussesu hi bhummadevesu ca imā catassopi yoniyo labbhanti.
atk-s0103a0:842_14: na jalābuje na saṃsedaje na opapātike”ti.
atk-s0103a0:843_4: Te hi devā neva attasañcetanāya maranti,
atk-s0103a0:845_1: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyoti dānasaṅkhātā dakkhiṇā visujjhanti mahapphalā honti etāhīti dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo.
atk-s0103a0:846_1: no paṭiggāhakatoti yattha dāyako sīlavā hoti,
atk-s0103a0:846_6: no dāyakatoti yattha paṭiggāhako sīlavā hoti,
atk-s0103a0:846_11: no paṭiggāhakatoti yattha ubhopi dussīlā deyyadhammopi adhammena nibbatto.
atk-s0103a0:850_0: Diṭṭhavāditāti diṭṭhaṃ mayāti evaṃ vāditā. Ettha ca taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:853_0: Attahitāya paṭipannādīsu paṭhamo yo sayaṃ sīlādisampanno,
atk-s0103a0:853_1: paraṃ sīlādīsu na samādapeti āyasmā vakkalitthero viya.
atk-s0103a0:853_3: paraṃ sīlādīsu samādapeti āyasmā upanando viya.
atk-s0103a0:853_5: paraṃ sīlādīsu na samādapeti devadatto viya.
atk-s0103a0:853_6: Catuttho yo attanā ca sīlādisampanno parañca sīlādīsu samādapeti āyasmā mahākassapo viya.
atk-s0103a0:854_1: Tamaparāyaṇoti tamameva paraṃ ayanaṃ gati assāti tamaparāyaṇo.
atk-s0103a0:854_3: Ettha ca paṭhamo nīce caṇḍālādikule dujjīvite hīnattabhāve nibbattitvā tīṇi duccaritāni paripūreti.
atk-s0103a0:854_4: Dutiyo tathāvidho hutvā tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti.
atk-s0103a0:854_5: Tatiyo uḷāre khattiyakule bahuannapāne sampannattabhāve nibbattitvā tīṇi duccaritāni paripūreti.
atk-s0103a0:854_6: Catuttho tādisova hutvā tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti.
atk-s0103a0:855_3: Sotāpanno hi catūhi vātehi indakhīlo viya parappavādehi akampiyo.
atk-s0103a0:855_7: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0103a0:855_8: Rāgadosānaṃ pana tanubhūtattā sakadāgāmī samaṇapadumo nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0103a0:855_10: Idhekacco puggalo sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0103a0:855_12: Rāgadosānaṃ abhāvā khippameva pupphissatīti anāgāmī samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0103a0:855_16: Arahā pana sabbesampi ganthakārakilesānaṃ abhāvā samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0103a0:856_2: Iti samapaññāsāya catukkānaṃ vasena dvepañhasatāni kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:859_1: Iti catukkavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:860_3: Tato paresu tīsu nibbattā khandhāva vuttā.
atk-s0103a0:861_1: Tena samannāgato bhikkhu āgantukaṃ disvā “ettha cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parikkhāro ṭhapito”tiādīni vatvā saṅghikampi āvāsaṃ nivāreti.
atk-s0103a0:861_2: So kālaṅkatvā peto vā ajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0103a0:861_4: Tena samannāgato bhikkhu tehi kāraṇehi attano upaṭṭhākakule aññesaṃ pavesanampi nivāreti.
atk-s0103a0:861_6: Tena samannāgato bhikkhu saṅghikampi lābhaṃ maccharāyanto yathā aññe na labhanti,
atk-s0103a0:861_11: Tena samannāgato bhikkhu “imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā eso maṃ abhibhavissatī”ti aññassa na deti.
atk-s0103a0:861_12: Yo pana dhammānuggahena vā puggalānuggahena vā na deti,
atk-s0103a0:863_1: Tehi pana baddhesu puggalesu rūpārūpabhave nibbattā sotāpannasakadāgāmino antobaddhā bahisayitā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:864_5: Vitthārato pana sikkhāpadakathā vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sikkhāpadavibhaṅge āgatā eva.
atk-s0103a0:867_7: Rogo hi ārogyaṃ byasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:867_10: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ vināsayamānā uppannā diṭṭhi eva byasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasanaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:867_11: Ettha ca ñātibyasanādīni tīṇi neva akusalāni na tilakkhaṇāhatāni.
atk-s0103a0:870_4: Kālena vakkhāmi no akālenāti ettha cuditakassa kālo kathito,
atk-s0103a0:870_6: Paraṃ codentena hi parisamajjhe vā uposathapavāraṇagge vā āsanasālābhojanasālādīsu vā na codetabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:870_8: ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codetabbaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:870_9: Puggalaṃ pana upaparikkhitvā yo lolapuggalo abhūtaṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0103a0:872_9: Tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ saddhā abhinīhārato āgatattā āgamanasaddhā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:872_11: Buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena okappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:872_17: iminā pana aṅgena tīsupi ratanesu saddhā adhippetā.
atk-s0103a0:872_29: Yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ āvikattāti yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā.
atk-s0103a0:872_30: Udayatthagāminiyāti udayañca atthaṅgamañca gantuṃ paricchindituṃ samatthāya,
atk-s0103a0:872_34: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti tadaṅgavasena kilesānaṃ pahīnattā yaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ khīyati,
atk-s0103a0:872_36: Iti sabbehi imehi padehi vipassanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:874_1: Suddhāvāsāti suddhā idha āvasiṃsu āvasanti āvasissanti vāti suddhāvāsā.
atk-s0103a0:875_0: Anāgāmīsu āyuno majjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarāva kilesaparinibbānaṃ arahattaṃ patto antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0103a0:875_1: Majjhaṃ upahacca atikkamitvā patto upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0103a0:875_2: Asaṅkhārena appayogena akilamanto sukhena patto asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0103a0:875_3: Sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto dukkhena patto sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0103a0:875_6: Yo hi avihāto paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0103a0:875_8: Yo avihāto dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā devalokaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0103a0:875_12: Yo heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva nibbattitvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0103a0:875_13: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāmāti.
atk-s0103a0:877_2: Satthari kaṅkhatīti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_3: Sarīre kaṅkhamāno “dvattiṃsamahāpurisavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_4: Guṇe kaṅkhamāno “atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_9: Ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhiloti ayaṃ satthari vicikicchāsaṅkhāto paṭhamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo.
atk-s0103a0:877_12: atthi nu kho etaṃ natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_16: taṃ atthi nu kho natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_17: Saṅghe kaṅkhatīti “ujuppaṭipannotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno cattāro maggaṭṭhā
atk-s0103a0:877_18: cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto saṅgho nāma atthi nu kho natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_21: sā atthi nu kho natthī”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0103a0:877_22: Ayaṃ pañcamoti ayaṃ sabrahmacārīsu kopasaṅkhāto pañcamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo kacavarabhāvo khāṇukabhāvo.
atk-s0103a0:879_1: Cetasovinibandhāti cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetasovinibandhā.
atk-s0103a0:879_9: Passasukhanti yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassavāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:879_15: Devo vā bhavissāmīti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi.
atk-s0103a0:882_4: asubhajjhānato vuṭṭhāya agadaṃ gahetvā visaṃ vīmaṃsanto viya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kāmābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassāti attho.
atk-s0103a0:882_9: Yathā pana kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati;
atk-s0103a0:882_11: Nekkhammaṃ kho panāti idha nekkhammaṃ nāma dasasu asubhesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:882_13: Tassa taṃ cittanti tassa taṃ asubhajjhānacittaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:882_18: Kāmapaccayā āsavā nāma kāmahetukā cattāro āsavā.
atk-s0103a0:882_21: Na so taṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti so taṃ kāmavedanaṃ vighātapariḷāhavedanañca na vedayati.
atk-s0103a0:882_22: Idamakkhātaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti idaṃ asubhajjhānaṃ kāmehi nissaṭattā kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:882_23: Yo pana taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tatiyaṃ maggaṃ patvā anāgāmiphalena nibbānaṃ disvā puna kāmā nāma natthīti jānāti,
atk-s0103a0:884_0: Pañcamavāre sakkāyaṃ manasikarototi suddhasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ pattassa sukkhavipassakassa
atk-s0103a0:884_1: phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassa.
atk-s0103a0:884_2: Idamakkhātaṃ sakkāyanissaraṇanti idaṃ arahattamaggena ca phalena ca nibbānaṃ disvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0103a0:884_3: puna sakkāyo natthīti uppannaṃ arahattaphalasamāpatticittaṃ sakkāyassa nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:886_9: Ayañhi taṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto āgatāgataṭṭhāne jhānavipassanāmaggaphalāni jānāti,
atk-s0103a0:886_11: So tassā pītiyā antarā osakkituṃ na dento upacārakammaṭṭhāniko hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0103a0:886_16: samādhinimittanti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu aññataro samādhiyeva samādhinimittaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:886_17: Suggahitaṃ hotītiādīsu ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantena suṭṭhu gahitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:886_19: Suppaṭividdhaṃ paññāyāti paññāya suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0103a0:888_1: Iti chabbīsatiyā pañcakānaṃ vasena tiṃsasatapañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:891_1: Iti pañcakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni chakkavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:891_10: Manosamphassoti ime dasa samphasse ṭhapetvā seso sabbo manosamphasso nāma.
atk-s0103a0:891_12: Rūpasaññāti rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannā saññā.
atk-s0103a0:892_2: Ettha pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti.
atk-s0103a0:892_10: Parinibbute pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0103a0:892_11: cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0103a0:892_13: Yo pana dhammassavane saṃghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0103a0:892_19: Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti, nisīdati,
atk-s0103a0:892_21: vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati,
atk-s0103a0:892_26: Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe agāravo katova hoti.
atk-s0103a0:892_27: Tisso sikkhā pana apūrayamānova sikkhāya agāravo nāma.
atk-s0103a0:892_29: Duvidhampi paṭisanthāraṃ akaronto paṭisanthāre agāravo nāma.
atk-s0103a0:893_7: Diṭṭhisāmaññagatoti iminā pana padena kosambakasutte paṭhamamaggo kathito.
atk-s0103a0:895_4: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0103a0:895_5: Kosambakakkhandhake viya dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti.
atk-s0103a0:895_8: Atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0103a0:895_9: Tattha dhammavādīnaṃ ārakkhadevatā dhammavādiniyo honti adhammavādīnaṃ adhammavādiniyo.
atk-s0103a0:895_10: Tato ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummā devatā bhijjanti.
atk-s0103a0:895_11: Evaṃ paramparā yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-s0103a0:895_14: taṃ taccha”nti dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarāva adhammaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0103a0:895_15: Te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā vadantā apāyesu nibbattanti.
atk-s0103a0:895_16: Evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
atk-s0103a0:896_0: Ajjhattaṃ vāti tumhākaṃ abbhantaraparisāya. Bahiddhā vāti paresaṃ parisāya.
atk-s0103a0:897_10: Duppaṭinissaggīti na sakkā hoti gahitaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.
atk-s0103a0:900_3: ‘Mā hevantissa vacanīyo’ti yasmā abhūtaṃ byākaraṇaṃ byākaroti,
atk-s0103a0:900_8: Yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānato vuṭṭhito saṅkhāre sammasitvā tatiyamaggaṃ patvā “puna byāpādo natthī”ti tatiyaphalena nibbānaṃ passati,
atk-s0103a0:901_1: Sā hi rāganimittādīnañceva rūpanimittādīnañca niccanimittādīnañca abhāvā “animittā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0103a0:902_1: Ayamahamasmīti pañcasu khandhesu ayaṃ nāma ahaṃ asmīti ettāvatā arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:902_3: ‘Mā hevantissa vacanīyo’ti sace te paṭhamamaggavajjhā vicikicchā uppajjati,
atk-s0103a0:902_7: Arahattamaggaphalavasena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe puna asmimāno natthīti arahattamaggo asmimānasamugghātoti vutto.
atk-s0103a0:904_5: niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena dasabalassa vā bhikkhusaṅghassa vā kasiṇāsubhanimittādīnaṃ vā aññatarassa dassanaṃ dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:904_7: niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena tiṇṇaṃ vā ratanānaṃ guṇakathāsavanaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasavanaṃ vā savanānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:904_13: tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ pāricariyā pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:904_15: tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ guṇānussaraṇaṃ anussatānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:905_3: So taṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0103a0:907_2: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhudvārārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena disvā javanakkhaṇe iṭṭhe arajjanto neva sumano hoti,
atk-s0103a0:907_4: Asamapekkhane mohaṃ anuppādento upekkhako viharati majjhatto,
atk-s0103a0:907_8: Iti chasupi dvāresu upekkhako viharatīti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:907_9: Sampajānoti vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti.
atk-s0103a0:907_10: Satatavihārāti vacanato aṭṭhapi mahācittāni labbhanti arajjanto adussantoti vacanato dasapi cittāni labbhanti.
atk-s0103a0:907_11: Somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti ce āsevanato labbhati.
atk-s0103a0:909_2: Kaṇhābhijātiko samānoti kaṇhe nīcakule jāto hutvā.
atk-s0103a0:909_3: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti kāḷakaṃ dasadussīlyadhammaṃ pasavati karoti.
atk-s0103a0:909_5: Sukkaṃ dhammanti ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīcakule nibbatto.
atk-s0103a0:909_6: Idāni puññaṃ karomīti puññasaṅkhātaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati.
atk-s0103a0:909_8: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0103a0:909_13: Nibbānañca nāma imasmiṃ atthe arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:909_16: Sukkābhijātiko samānoti sukke uccakule jāto hutvā.
atk-s0103a0:912_2: Iti dvāvīsatiyā chakkānaṃ vasena bāttiṃsasatapañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:915_0: 330. Iti chakkavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni sattakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:916_3: Paññāya hi ṭhatvā tīṇi sucaritāni pañcasīlāni dasasīlāni pūretvā saggūpagā honti,
atk-s0103a0:918_0: Asataṃ dhammā asantā vā dhammā lāmakā dhammāti asaddhammā.
atk-s0103a0:918_3: Saddhammesu pana saddhādayo sabbepi vipassakasseva kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:919_2: Tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānātīti atthaññū.
atk-s0103a0:919_3: “Ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā”ti evaṃ attānaṃ jānātīti attaññū.
atk-s0103a0:919_7: ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyāti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti kālaññū.
atk-s0103a0:919_8: Ettha ca pañca vassāni uddesassa kālo.
atk-s0103a0:920_6: Titthiyā hi dasavassakāle mataṃ nigaṇṭhaṃ niddasoti vadanti.
atk-s0103a0:920_7: So kira puna dasavasso na hoti.
atk-s0103a0:920_11: Eteneva nayena vīsativassādikālepi mataṃ nibbīso, nittiṃso,
atk-s0103a0:920_14: Āyasmā ānando gāme vicaranto taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0103a0:921_1: titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:921_2: Khīṇāsavo hi dasavassakāle parinibbuto puna dasavasso na hoti.
atk-s0103a0:921_13: Iti bhagavā mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacana”nti –
atk-s0103a0:922_0: Vatvā yehi kāraṇehi so niddaso hoti,
atk-s0103a0:922_2: Theropi tameva desanaṃ uddharitvā satta niddasavatthūni idhāvuso, bhikkhu,
atk-s0103a0:922_5: Sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hotīti sikkhattayapūraṇe bahalacchando hoti.
atk-s0103a0:922_6: Āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemoti anāgate punadivasādīsupi sikkhāpūraṇe avigatapemena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0103a0:925_2: Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:926_1: Adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
atk-s0103a0:926_3: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
atk-s0103a0:927_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
atk-s0103a0:927_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā aññattha vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ
atk-s0103a0:927_2: antarāmagge vā yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ tattha saṅghena vā saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva
atk-s0103a0:927_4: Evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā,
atk-s0103a0:928_0: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
atk-s0103a0:929_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti,
atk-s0103a0:929_2: tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati.
atk-s0103a0:929_3: Tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitaparisāya
atk-s0103a0:929_4: dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti,
atk-s0103a0:929_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:930_5: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
atk-s0103a0:930_8: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
atk-s0103a0:930_11: ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati.
atk-s0103a0:930_13: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0103a0:930_14: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:930_15: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0103a0:931_0: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
atk-s0103a0:931_2: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
atk-s0103a0:931_3: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti,
atk-s0103a0:931_4: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:931_5: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0103a0:932_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
atk-s0103a0:932_3: Sace chinnamūlo ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0103a0:932_4: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0103a0:932_6: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
atk-s0103a0:932_8: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
atk-s0103a0:932_9: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
atk-s0103a0:933_0: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
atk-s0103a0:934_0: Puggalassa gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
atk-s0103a0:934_8: Dve pakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācaritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma,
atk-s0103a0:934_9: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya saṃvatteyyāti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0103a0:934_10: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
atk-s0103a0:935_0: Tattha hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā niddampi okkantā honti,
atk-s0103a0:935_1: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0103a0:935_4: Imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
atk-s0103a0:935_6: uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
atk-s0103a0:936_2: Iti cuddasannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhanavuti pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:939_1: Iti sattakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:940_1: Kusītavatthūnīti kusītassa alasassa vatthūni patiṭṭhā kosajjakāraṇānīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:940_2: Kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotīti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:940_3: Na vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati.
atk-s0103a0:940_7: Idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu.
atk-s0103a0:940_9: “Māsācitaṃ maññe”ti ettha pana māsācitaṃ nāma tintamāso.
atk-s0103a0:940_12: Gilānā vuṭṭhito hotīti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti.
atk-s0103a0:941_0: 335. Ārambhavatthūnīti vīriyakāraṇāni. Tesampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:942_2: Āsajja dānaṃ detīti patvā dānaṃ deti.
atk-s0103a0:942_3: Āgataṃ disvāva muhuttaṃyeva nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0103a0:942_5: Iti ettha āsādanaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0103a0:942_6: Bhayā dānaṃ detītiādīsupi bhayādīni dānakāraṇānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0103a0:942_7: Tattha bhayaṃ nāma ayaṃ adāyako akārakoti garahābhayaṃ vā apāyabhayaṃ vā.
atk-s0103a0:942_8: Adāsi meti mayhaṃ pubbe esa idaṃ nāma adāsīti deti.
atk-s0103a0:942_9: Dassati meti anāgate idaṃ nāma dassatīti deti.
atk-s0103a0:942_10: Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundaraṃ,
atk-s0103a0:942_12: Cittālaṅkāracittaparikkhāratthaṃ dānaṃ detīti samathavipassanācittassa alaṅkāratthañceva parivāratthañca deti.
atk-s0103a0:945_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu dānesu cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:946_6: Uttari abhāvitanti tato uttari maggaphalatthāya abhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:946_7: Tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatīti yaṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0103a0:947_0: Vītarāgassāti maggena vā samucchinnarāgassa samāpattiyā vā vikkhambhitarāgassa.
atk-s0103a0:947_1: Dānamatteneva hi brahmaloke nibbattituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0103a0:947_2: Dānaṃ pana samādhivipassanācittassa alaṅkāro parivāro hoti.
atk-s0103a0:947_3: Tato dānena muducitto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattati.
atk-s0103a0:948_0: Khattiyānaṃ parisā khattiyaparisā, samūhoti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0103a0:949_7: Lābho alābhoti lābhe āgate alābho āgato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:951_2: Iti ekādasannaṃ aṭṭhakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhāsīti pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:954_1: Iti aṭṭhakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni navakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:954_3: Āghātaṃ bandhatīti kopaṃ bandhati karoti uppādeti.
atk-s0103a0:955_0: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosīti etasmiṃ puggale kuto labbhā,
atk-s0103a0:955_2: Paro nāma parassa attano cittaruciyā anatthaṃ karotīti evaṃ cintetvā āghātaṃ paṭivinodeti.
atk-s0103a0:955_4: taṃ kopakaraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā,
atk-s0103a0:956_6: Asaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhesu anibbattantesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ suññaṃ hotīti asabbakālikattā na gahitā.
atk-s0103a0:957_1: Akkhaṇesu dhammo ca desiyatīti catusaccadhammo desiyati.
atk-s0103a0:960_2: Iti channaṃ navakānaṃ vasena catupaṇṇāsa pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:963_1: Iti navakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni dasakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0103a0:963_6: dhammā nāthakaraṇā”ti evaṃ akkhātā attano patiṭṭhākarā dhammā.
atk-s0103a0:964_0: Kalyāṇamittotiādīsu sīlādiguṇasampannā kalyāṇā assa mittāti kalyāṇamitto.
atk-s0103a0:964_1: Te cassa ṭhānanisajjādīsu saha ayanato sahāyāti kalyāṇasahāyo.
atk-s0103a0:964_2: Cittena ceva kāyena ca kalyāṇamittesu eva sampavaṅko onatoti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
atk-s0103a0:964_3: Suvaco hotīti sukhena vattabbo hoti sukhena anusāsitabbo.
atk-s0103a0:964_4: Khamoti gāḷhena pharusena kakkhaḷena vuccamāno khamati,
atk-s0103a0:964_6: Padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti yathā ekacco ovadiyamāno vāmato gaṇhāti,
atk-s0103a0:964_10: tumhesu anovadantesu ko añño ovadissatī”ti padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0103a0:965_1: Kiṃ karaṇīyānīti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
atk-s0103a0:965_2: Tattha uccakammāni nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhiyagharesu kattabbanti evamādi.
atk-s0103a0:966_10: Atha vā suttantapiṭakampi abhidhammapiṭakampi dhammo eva.
atk-s0103a0:966_14: Iti sabbasmimpi ettha dhamme abhidhamme vinaye abhivinaye ca.
atk-s0103a0:968_2: Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena vā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā āyatanāni.
atk-s0103a0:968_9: Tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo.
atk-s0103a0:968_10: Tena vuttaṃ “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti.
atk-s0103a0:968_11: Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:968_12: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti, na aññaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:968_16: Appamāṇanti idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:968_21: Tattha kasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃ adho tiriyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:968_23: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva.
atk-s0103a0:970_1: Kammapathesu kammāneva sugatiduggatīnaṃ pathabhūtattā kammapathā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:970_2: Tesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ musāvādādayo ca cattāro brahmajāle vitthāritā eva.
atk-s0103a0:970_3: Kāmesumicchācāroti ettha pana kāmesūti methunasamācāresu methunavatthūsu vā.
atk-s0103a0:970_5: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0103a0:971_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā,
atk-s0103a0:971_19: Itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā.
atk-s0103a0:971_21: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo.
atk-s0103a0:972_2: Sā “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0103a0:972_5: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0103a0:972_6: yāva “aho vatīdaṃ mamassā”ti attano na pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0103a0:973_1: So paraṃ vināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo pharusāvācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca.
atk-s0103a0:973_4: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0103a0:973_5: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjheyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ na cinteti.
atk-s0103a0:974_5: Tassā dve sambhārā vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā,
atk-s0103a0:975_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:976_0: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti.
atk-s0103a0:977_1: micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti,
atk-s0103a0:977_4: Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:978_7: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā.
atk-s0103a0:979_1: Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi “gacchatha naṃ ghātethā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0103a0:980_3: Musāvādo dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena vā tathā pisuṇavācā samphappalāpo ca.
atk-s0103a0:983_0: Dhammato pana etesupi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vattanti viratiyopi. Ante tayo cetanāsampayuttāva.
atk-s0103a0:984_2: Ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-s0103a0:984_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0103a0:985_2: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0103a0:985_3: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:986_0: Vedanātoti sabbe sukhavedanā honti majjhattavedanā vā. Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0103a0:987_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlāni honti,
atk-s0103a0:987_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0103a0:989_1: Ariyavāsāti ariyā eva vasiṃsu vasanti vasissanti etesūti ariyavāsā.
atk-s0103a0:989_2: Pañcaṅgavippahīnoti pañcahi aṅgehi vippayuttova hutvā khīṇāsavo avasi vasati vasissatīti tasmā ayaṃ pañcaṅgavippahīnatā,
atk-s0103a0:990_1: bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hotīti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0103a0:991_0: Satārakkhena cetasāti khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu sabbakālaṃ sati ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0103a0:991_1: Tenevassa “carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0103a0:992_5: idameva dassanaṃ saccanti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:992_12: Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā na puna cittaṃ āruhanti,
atk-s0103a0:993_2: Sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano.
atk-s0103a0:993_4: Rāgā cittaṃ vimuttantiādīhi maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:994_0: Rāgo me pahīnotiādīhi paccavekkhaṇāya phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:997_2: Iti channaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena samasaṭṭhi pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
atk-s0103a0:1000_2: Imasmiñhi sutte ekakavasena dve pañhā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:1000_11: Dasakavasena samasaṭṭhīti evaṃ sahassaṃ cuddasa pañhā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:1001_0: Imañhi suttantaṃ ṭhapetvā tepiṭake buddhavacane añño suttanto evaṃ bahupañhapaṭimaṇḍito natthi.
atk-s0103a0:1001_1: Bhagavā imaṃ suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya sakalaṃ sutvā cintesi –
atk-s0103a0:1001_2: “dhammasenāpati sāriputto buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0103a0:1001_5: tasmā jinabhāsitaṃ katvā devamanussānaṃ okappanaṃ imasmiṃ suttante uppādessāmī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:1001_7: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā vuṭṭhahitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi, sādhu, sādhu,
atk-s0103a0:1002_3: mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditvā bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaggirasaṃ abhāsī”ti.
atk-s0103a0:1002_4: Samanuñño satthā ahosīti anumodanena samanuñño ahosi.
atk-s0103a0:1002_5: Ettakena ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto.
atk-s0103a0:1002_6: Desanāpariyosāne imaṃ suttantaṃ manasikarontā te bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0103a0:1004_5: Sāvakā satthāraṃ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapessāmāti satthu ālapanena anālapitvā āvusoti ālapanti.
atk-s0103a0:1004_6: Te bhikkhūti te dhammasenāpatiṃ parivāretvā nisinnā bhikkhū.
atk-s0103a0:1004_11: Upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikāya dasapi vīsatipi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi bhikkhū vaggā vaggā kammaṭṭhānatthāya āgacchanti.
atk-s0103a0:1005_0: Satthā tesaṃ cariyavasena rāgacaritassa asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ deti.
atk-s0103a0:1005_7: Saddhācaritassa pasādanīyasuttante buddhasubodhiṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0103a0:1005_9: Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sace sappāyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:1005_13: Te tattha vasantā temāsikaṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā ghaṭetvā vāyamantā sotāpannāpi honti sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi arahantopi.
atk-s0103a0:1006_0: Tato vutthavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “bhagavā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patto…pe…
atk-s0103a0:1006_2: Tattha ime bhikkhū upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya āgatā.
atk-s0103a0:1006_3: Evaṃ āgantvā gacchante pana bhikkhū bhagavā aggasāvakānaṃ santikaṃ peseti,
atk-s0103a0:1006_7: Bhikkhū ca vadanti “kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0103a0:1006_9: Atha ne bhagavā tesaṃ dassane uyyojesi. “Sevatha,
atk-s0103a0:1007_0: Tadāpi bhagavā imehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsayaṃ upaparikkhanto “ime bhikkhū sāvakavineyyā”ti addasa.
atk-s0103a0:1007_1: Sāvakavineyyā nāma ye buddhānampi dhammadesanāya bujjhanti sāvakānampi.
atk-s0103a0:1007_2: Buddhavineyyā pana sāvakā bodhetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0103a0:1007_3: Sāvakavineyyabhāvaṃ pana etesaṃ ñatvā katarassa bhikkhuno desanāya bujjhissantīti olokento sāriputtassāti disvā therassa santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0103a0:1007_4: Thero te bhikkhū pucchi “satthu santikaṃ gatattha āvuso”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0103a0:1007_5: gatamha satthārā pana amhe tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesitā”ti.
atk-s0103a0:1007_6: Tato thero “ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ desanāya bujjhissanti,
atk-s0103a0:1007_7: kīdisī nu kho tesaṃ desanā vaṭṭatī”ti cintento “ime bhikkhū samaggārāmā,
atk-s0103a0:1007_8: sāmaggirasassa dīpikā nesaṃ desanā vaṭṭatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ desetukāmo dasuttaraṃ pavakkhāmītiādimāha.
atk-s0103a0:1007_9: Tattha dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vibhattoti dasuttaro,
atk-s0103a0:1007_10: ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā gatotipi dasuttaro,
atk-s0103a0:1007_11: ekekasmiṃ pabbe dasa dasa pañhā visesitātipi dasuttaro,
atk-s0103a0:1008_0: Iti thero desanaṃ uccaṃ karonto bhikkhūnaṃ tattha pemaṃ janento evametaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ
atk-s0103a0:1008_1: dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ maññissantīti catūhi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0103a0:1008_4: maggo”tiādinā nayena tesaṃ tesaṃ suttānaṃ bhagavā viya.
atk-s0103a0:1020_1: Iti āyasmā sāriputto yathā nāma dakkho veḷukāro sammukhībhūtaṃ veḷuṃ chetvā niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā dasadhā
atk-s0103a0:1020_2: khaṇḍe katvā ekamekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hīraṃ hīraṃ karonto phāleti,
atk-s0103a0:1020_3: evameva tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyaṃ desanaṃ upaparikkhitvā dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ekekakoṭṭhāse ekekapadaṃ vibhajanto “katamo eko dhammo bahukāro,
atk-s0103a0:1020_4: appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti”tiādinā nayena desanaṃ vitthāretuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0103a0:1021_0: Tattha appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti sabbatthakaṃ upakārakaṃ appamādaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0103a0:1021_14: vipassanāñāṇādīsu aṭṭhasu vijjāsūti sabbesu anavajjaṭṭhena kusalesu dhammesu bahūpakāro.
atk-s0103a0:1022_8: appamādo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādinā nayena hatthipadādīhi opammehi opamento saṃyuttanikāye appamādavagge nānappakāraṃ thometi.
atk-s0103a0:1022_9: Taṃ sabbaṃ ekapadeneva saṅgahetvā thero appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti āha.
atk-s0103a0:1023_0: (Ka) asokarājā hi nigrodhasāmaṇerassa “appamādo amatapada”nti gāthaṃ sutvā eva “tiṭṭha, tāta,
atk-s0103a0:1023_1: mayhaṃ tayā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kathita”nti sāmaṇere pasīditvā caturāsītivihārasahassāni kāresi.
atk-s0103a0:1023_2: Iti thāmasampannena bhikkhunā appamādassa bahūpakāratā tīhi piṭakehi dīpetvā kathetabbā.
atk-s0103a0:1023_3: Yaṃkiñci suttaṃ vā gāthaṃ vā appamādadīpanatthaṃ āharanto “aṭṭhāne ṭhatvā āharasi,
atk-s0103a0:1024_0: (Kha) kāyagatāsatīti ānāpānaṃ catuiriyāpatho satisampajaññaṃ dvattiṃsākāro catudhātuvavatthānaṃ dasa
atk-s0103a0:1024_1: asubhā nava sivathikā cuṇṇikamanasikāro kesādīsu cattāri rūpajjhānānīti ettha uppannasatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1024_2: Sātasahagatāti ṭhapetvā catutthajjhānaṃ aññattha sātasahagatā hoti sukhasampayuttā,
atk-s0103a0:1025_0: (Ga) sāsavo upādāniyoti āsavānañceva upādānānañca paccayabhūto. Iti tebhūmakadhammameva niyameti.
atk-s0103a0:1027_0: (Ṅa) ayoniso manasikāroti anicce niccantiādinā nayena pavatto uppathamanasikāro.
atk-s0103a0:1029_0: (Cha) ānantariko cetosamādhīti aññattha maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ ānantariko cetosamādhi nāma.
atk-s0103a0:1029_1: Idha pana vipassanānantaro maggo vipassanāya vā anantarattā attano vā anantaraṃ phaladāyakattā ānantariko cetosamādhīti adhippeto.
atk-s0103a0:1030_0: (Ja) akuppaṃ ñāṇanti aññattha phalapaññā akuppañāṇaṃ nāma. Idha paccavekkhaṇapaññā adhippetā.
atk-s0103a0:1031_1: Ayaṃ eko dhammoti yena paccayena tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0103a0:1034_3: Avitathāti yathā vuttā na tathā na honti.
atk-s0103a0:1034_5: Sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhāti tathāgatena bodhipallaṅke nisīditvā hetunā kāraṇena sayameva abhisambuddhā ñātā viditā sacchikatā.
atk-s0103a0:1034_7: ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ rañño lekhavācakasadiso”ti jinasuttaṃ dassento okappanaṃ janesi.
atk-s0103a0:1037_1: (Ka) ime dve dhammā bahukārāti ime dve satisampajaññā dhammā sīlapūraṇādīsu appamādo viya sabbattha upakārakā hitāvahā.
atk-s0103a0:1038_0: (Kha) samatho ca vipassanā cāti ime dve saṅgītisutte lokiyalokuttarā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:1039_0: (Cha) sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti ayoniso manasikāro hetu ceva paccayo ca sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya,
atk-s0103a0:1039_12: Dasa akusalakammapathā dasa kusalakammapathāti evaṃ pabhedā ime dve dhammā duppaṭivijjhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0103a0:1040_0: (Jha) saṅkhatā dhātūti paccayehi katā pañcakkhandhā. Asaṅkhatā dhātūti paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1041_0: (Ña) vijjā ca vimutti cāti ettha vijjāti tisso vijjā. Vimuttīti arahattaphalaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1045_1: (Cha) kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhammanti ettha nekkhammanti anāgāmimaggo adhippeto.
atk-s0103a0:1045_3: Rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ āruppanti ettha āruppepi arahattamaggo.
atk-s0103a0:1045_4: Puna uppattinivāraṇato sabbaso rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0103a0:1045_5: Nirodho tassa nissaraṇanti idha arahattaphalaṃ nirodhoti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1045_6: Arahattaphalena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe puna āyatiṃ sabbasaṅkhārā na hontīti arahattaṃ saṅkhatanirodhassa paccayattā nirodhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1046_0: (Ja) atītaṃse ñāṇanti atītaṃsārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ itaresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0103a0:1050_1: (Ka) cattāri cakkānīti ettha cakkaṃ nāma dārucakkaṃ,
atk-s0103a0:1050_15: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti idaṃ sampatticakkaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1051_2: Sappurisūpanissayoti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ avassayanaṃ sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1051_4: sace pana pubbe assaddhādīhi samannāgato hoti,
atk-s0103a0:1051_8: Yena hi ñāṇasampayuttacittena kusalaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0103a0:1051_9: tadeva kusalaṃ taṃ purisaṃ patirūpadese upaneti,
atk-s0103a0:1051_11: So eva ca puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0103a0:1051_13: Sesā pana tayo saṅgītisutte lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:1053_0: (Cha) hānabhāgiyādīsu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāgiyo samādhi.
atk-s0103a0:1053_3: Nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhito nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhīti iminā nayena sabbasamāpattiyo vitthāretvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0103a0:1057_1: (Kha) pītipharaṇatādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:1057_2: Sukhaṃ pharamānaṃ uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu paññā sukhapharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:1057_3: Paresaṃ ceto pharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā nāma.
atk-s0103a0:1057_10: Tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimitta”nti.
atk-s0103a0:1058_0: Tattha pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatā dve pādā viya.
atk-s0103a0:1058_4: Iti āyasmā sāriputtatthero pañcaṅgikaṃ sammāsamādhiṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasampannaṃ purisaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0103a0:1059_0: (Ja) ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ce vātiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto.
atk-s0103a0:1059_2: Purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa samādhisukhassa paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko.
atk-s0103a0:1060_5: Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvaṃ vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhaladdho.
atk-s0103a0:1060_6: Paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1060_8: Ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato.
atk-s0103a0:1060_9: Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā nasasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
atk-s0103a0:1060_10: Tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullapattattā.
atk-s0103a0:1060_12: Yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0103a0:1060_13: Tasmā yadettha “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamānassa paccattaṃyeva aparappaccayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0103a0:1060_16: Evamimehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi ayaṃ samādhi “pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī”ti vutto.
atk-s0103a0:1061_0: Imasmiṃ vāre visesabhāgiyapade maggo kathito. Sacchikātabbapade phalaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0103a0:1063_0: 356. Chakkesu sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. Duppaṭivijjhapade panettha maggo kathito. Sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1065_1: (Ña) sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā hontīti hetunā nayena vipassanāñāṇena sudiṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0103a0:1065_3: dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viya sudiṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0103a0:1067_1: (Ka) ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāyāti sikkhattayasaṅgahassa maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāya pubbabhāge taruṇasamathavipassanāpaññāya.
atk-s0103a0:1067_7: Garubhāvanīyañhi upanissāya viharato kilesā nuppajjanti ovādānusāsaniṃ labhati.
atk-s0103a0:1067_8: Tasmā taṃ nissāya vihāro paññāpaṭilābhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0103a0:1068_0: (Cha) akkhaṇesu yasmā petā asurānaṃ āvāhanaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0103a0:1069_4: Tattha paccayaappiccho bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0103a0:1069_8: Adhigamaappiccho majjhantikatthero viya attano adhigamaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti.
atk-s0103a0:1069_9: Pariyattiappiccho tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti sāketatissatthero viya.
atk-s0103a0:1069_10: Dhutaṅgaappiccho dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti dvebhātikattheresu jeṭṭhakatthero viya.
atk-s0103a0:1069_12: Ayaṃ dhammoti evaṃ santaguṇanigūhanena ca paccayapaṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya ca appicchassa puggalassa ayaṃ navalokuttaradhammo sampajjati,
atk-s0103a0:1070_0: Santuṭṭhassāti catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭhassa.
atk-s0103a0:1070_2: Tattha kāyaviveko nāma gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā aṭṭhaārambhavatthuvasena ekībhāvo.
atk-s0103a0:1070_3: Ekībhāvamattena pana kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0103a0:1070_5: Samāpattimatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0103a0:1071_0: Saṅgaṇikārāmassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca ratassa.
atk-s0103a0:1072_0: Idha bhāvetabbapade maggo kathito. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0103a0:1074_6: Addhattayepi hi paccayavaseneva dhammā pavattantīti passato kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
atk-s0103a0:1074_8: vīthippaṭipannaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ maggoti evaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0103a0:1074_13: Etā pana sattapi visuddhiyo vitthārena visuddhimagge kathitā.
atk-s0103a0:1075_0: (Cha) dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattanti cakkhādidhātunānattaṃ paṭicca cakkhusamphassādinānattaṃ uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0103a0:1075_5: Saṅkappanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandanānattanti saṅkappanānattatāya rūpe chando sadde chandoti evaṃ chandanānattaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0103a0:1075_6: Pariḷāhanānattanti chandanānattatāya rūpapariḷāho saddapariḷāhoti evaṃ pariḷāhanānattaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0103a0:1078_2: Micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotīti ayaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāyapi nijjiṇṇā eva pahīnā.
atk-s0103a0:1079_0: Ettha ca sammādiṭṭhipaccayā catusaṭṭhi dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0103a0:1079_11: pavattasantatiadhipateyyaṭṭhena jīvitindriyaṃ paripūretīti evaṃ catūsu maggesu catūsu phalesu aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā catusaṭṭhi dhammā pāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0103a0:1080_6: pañcake paññāsāti aḍḍhachaṭṭhāni pañhasatāni kathitāni honti.
atk-s0103a0:1081_1: attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandu”nti sādhu,
atk-s0103a0:1081_3: Tāya ca pana attamanatāya imameva suttaṃ āvajjamānā pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0103a0:1089_0: Yaṃ ārabhiṃ sumaṅgala, vilāsiniṃ nāma nāmena.
atk-s0103a0:1099_0: Yaṃ puññamupacitaṃ tena, hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti.

atk-s0103a0:1100_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ sumaṅgalavilāsinī nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathā –
